product_name: Cloverdale Milk Skim Instant Powder 10 KG/22lbs - Canadian Made
short_description:
Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder – High-Quality Dairy for Versatile Applications

Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder is a premium Canadian-made dairy ingredient, perfect for a wide range of culinary and industrial applications. With excellent solubility, dispersibility, and wettability, this high-protein, low-fat milk powder is ideal for baking, cooking, and beverage formulations.

Why Choose Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder?

Pure, Nutritious, and High-Quality

  • Made from 100% real skim milk, providing essential nutrients and a clean dairy taste.
  • High in protein and calcium, supporting balanced nutrition.

Superior Solubility & Easy Mixing

  • Dissolves instantly in hot or cold water, making it ideal for instant beverages and food applications.
  • Designed for excellent dispersion, ensuring smooth, lump-free results.

Versatile Culinary & Industrial Applications

  • Baking: Enhances texture, flavor, and browning in bread, cakes, and pastries.
  • Beverages: Perfect for hot cocoa, smoothies, coffee creamers, and protein shakes.
  • Soups & Sauces: Adds creaminess and richness to instant soups and dressings.
  • Desserts: Used in puddings, ice creams, and confectionery for a smooth finish.
  • Infant Formula & Nutritional Products: A trusted dairy base in powdered nutritional formulations.

Product Details

  • Size: 10 KG (22 lbs) bulk packaging
  • Made in Canada, ensuring strict quality control and premium standards
  • Shelf-Stable & Long-Lasting, perfect for commercial and home use

Ideal for Food Service & Manufacturing

Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder is a reliable, high-quality ingredient for bakeries, food processors, beverage manufacturers, and home kitchens. Stock up today and experience the convenience of premium powdered dairy!

product_name: Neilson 3.25% Ultrafiltered Milk, 1L
short_description: Neilson ultrafiltered milk s fresh milk from Canadian dairy farms that passes through a fine filter to concentrate the natural protein and reduce the lactose, a naturally occurring sugar in milk. Offering 18 g of protein per 250 mL and 25% less lactose (sugar) than regular milk, Neilson ultrafiltered milk is a simple way to fuel your day with a little extra joy.

Formulated to work best while you sleep. Contains time-released, microencapsulated Retinol to maximize efficacy and minimize irritation. Boosts the efficacy of Retinol with Bakuchiol. Supports short-term and long-term skin health and radiant skin. Helps sagging skin appear firmer and more lifted. Visibly reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles. Balances skin’s own Microbiome with Prebiotic Innovation.      Brand Story      For more than 30 years, Revision Skincare has provided dermatologists, plastic surgeons and estheticians with clinically-proven, highly advanced offerings for skin health and longevity. Made in the U.S.A.

Plus, it’s dermatologically tested and suitable for all skin types, including dry skin and sensitive skin. Apply this NIVEA face moisturizer daily as part of your skincare routine and enjoy its delicate rose fragrance.

short_description: Even skin tone and texture to reveal naturally radiant skin with Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Moisturizer. The daily moisturizer is part of Aveeno’s Positively Radiant collection, which is designed to enhance your natural radiance and give you a lit-from-within glow. Pair with other Positively Radiant products or explore other Aveeno collections for a skin solution that's positively you. Ensure skin is clean prior to application and massage into face until the moisturizer is fully absorbed. This product comes in a 68 mL bottle of face cream. Bottle now made with 30% Post Consumer Recycled Plastic.

short_description: The new Vaseline® Intensive Care™ Aloe Vera Hydration Lotion contains 1% Aloe Vera, known to help soothe dry skin, and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids which fortify the skin barrier. product_name: L'Oréal Paris Vitamin C Brightening Daily Moisturizing Cream, 50mL, Brightening Cream
short_description:
"L'Oréal Paris Vitamin C Brightening Cream is a multi-tasking moisturizer that delivers both instant radiance and clinically proven, long-term brightening results. Formulated with a powerful blend of Vitamin C derivative, a potent antioxidant that helps reduce the look of dullness and signs of aging, this lightweight cream also contains salicylic acid and light-reflecting pigments. Together, these ingredients minimize the look of pores, refine texture, and create a more even skin tone - all while providing 24-hour hydration. For a powerful brightening boost, pair this cream with the L'Oréal Paris 12% Pure Vitamin C Serum and achieve your brightest skin yet!

BENEFITS
Clinically Proven Results: In 8 weeks, skin looks brighter by 25%, texture looks smoother by 34%, tone looks more even by 10%, and pores look reduced by 10%.
Visible Brightening: This daily moisturizer, infused with Vitamin C derivative, a powerful antioxidant, visibly reduces the look of dullness for a more even-toned, luminous complexion.
Smooths & Refines Texture: Salicylic acid gently exfoliates to minimize the appearance of pores, rough patches, and uneven texture.
Instant Glow, 24H Hydration: Get a radiant, healthy-looking glow instantly. This non-greasy cream absorbs quickly and keeps skin hydrated for 24 hours.
Power Duo for Brighter Skin: Enhance the brightening benefits of this cream by pairing it with the L'Oréal Paris 12% Pure Vitamin C Serum for visibly enhanced radiance.

HOW TO USE
Apply the cream morning and evening to a thouroughly cleansed face and neck."

It's a time-saving and stress-free solution that allows you to focus on unleashing your creativity in the kitchen.

With its 715g size, this jar of BERTHELET Culinary Cream Base provides you with ample supply to experiment and create culinary wonders. Whether you're a professional chef looking to impress your guests or a passionate home cook seeking to delight your family and friends, this cream base is your secret ingredient for culinary success.

So, why settle for ordinary when you can enhance your culinary delights with the extraordinary? Grab a jar of BERTHELET Culinary Cream Base and unlock a world of flavors and possibilities in your kitchen. Elevate your dishes, ignite your taste buds, and become the culinary hero you were born to be. Get ready to experience culinary perfection with BERTHELET Culinary Cream Base.

short_description: Looking for a little lighter creamer for your coffee or tea? COFFEE-MATE® Light Powder (450 g) is your cup’s perfect lower-fat match! With 40% less fat than the Original per 2 g serving, it’s an easy way to enhance your coffee or tea any time of day. Plus, COFFEE-MATE® is lactose free. Fall in love with COFFEE-MATE®’s smooth & rich taste! Whether starting your day or taking a moment to recharge, the rich, creamy taste of COFFEE-MATE® Light is the perfect way to wake up your cup.

product_name: Becel Margarine Original, 850 g
short_description:
Proudly crafted in Canada, Becel Original has been a staple in Canadians' kitchens for over 40 years. Whether it's a freshly toasted bagel to start your day, eggs scrambled to perfection for a simple lunch, or a batch of delightfully soft and chewy cookies, treat your family to that iconic Becel taste you know and love. Ideal for cooking, baking or spreading, Becel Original can be used as a 1:1 swap for butter in your favourite sweet or savoury dish.

product_name: Daiya Dairy Free Cheddar Cheese Slices, 220g
short_description:
Is there any comfort food more iconic than cheese? Our plant based cheese melts like dairy, tastes like dairy, and even looks like dairy...minus the actual dairy. We're reimagining the way plant based cheese is made, combining traditional cheesemaking methods with the goodness of oat. Our dairy free cheese is made with Daiya Oat Cream™ blend, for a cheesy, "melts-like-dairy" experience that comforts the way cheese should. Just like dairy cheese, our dairy free cheese slices can be enjoyed hot or cold. Smooth, creamy, and flavourful, these versatile slices are ready to top all your burgers and sandwiches with some cheesy perfection.

Grilled cheese? Yes please! With a smooth texture and slightly sharp taste, our dairy free Cheddar Slices can better any burger, sandwich or crunchy crackers. Yep, these dairy free cheddar cheese slices are so delicious, you can enjoy them all on their own. Mmm.

product_name: Red Baron Classic Crust 4 Cheese, RED BARON Frozen Classic Crust 4 Cheese Multi Serve Pizza
short_description: RED BARON Classic Crust Four Cheese Pizza - One bite into our four cheese pizza and you know this will be a moment to remember. Savor the mouth-watering taste of zesty tomato sauce and 100% real mozzarella, cheddar, provolone, and parmesan cheese, all piled on top of our Classic Crust that's not too thick and not too thin with just the right amount of crunch. Our delicious, melty cheese pizza is an excellent source of protein and calcium so you can feel good about every single slice you serve. Whether it's part of a mid-week family dinner, a late-night study session with friends, or a quick snack before sports practice, let our frozen pizzas help you and the people you love savor every moment. Easy to make and easier to enjoy, this frozen pizza serves up quality and flavor in just 18-21 minutes, so you can get back to what matters. No matter the occasion, you can count on RED BARON pizza to please the crowd. You can quickly bake our frozen pizza as part of an easy dinner, giving your family more time to catch up over every cheesy bite. Everyone at your next pizza party will buzz about the perfect crust that's not too thin and not too thick, with just the right amount of crunch! And you'll feel the pride and excitement of bringing people together to share a delicious meal-and lots of memorable moments-again and again. Make your next meal mean more with a RED BARON Classic Crust Four Cheese Pizza.

product_name: Daiya Dairy Free Cheddar Cheese Slices, 220g
short_description:
Is there any comfort food more iconic than cheese? Our plant based cheese melts like dairy, tastes like dairy, and even looks like dairy...minus the actual dairy. We're reimagining the way plant based cheese is made, combining traditional cheesemaking methods with the goodness of oat. Our dairy free cheese is made with Daiya Oat Cream™ blend, for a cheesy, "melts-like-dairy" experience that comforts the way cheese should. Just like dairy cheese, our dairy free cheese slices can be enjoyed hot or cold. Smooth, creamy, and flavourful, these versatile slices are ready to top all your burgers and sandwiches with some cheesy perfection.

Grilled cheese? Yes please! With a smooth texture and slightly sharp taste, our dairy free Cheddar Slices can better any burger, sandwich or crunchy crackers. Yep, these dairy free cheddar cheese slices are so delicious, you can enjoy them all on their own. Mmm.

product_name: Red Baron Classic Crust 4 Cheese, RED BARON Frozen Classic Crust 4 Cheese Multi Serve Pizza
short_description: RED BARON Classic Crust Four Cheese Pizza - One bite into our four cheese pizza and you know this will be a moment to remember. Savor the mouth-watering taste of zesty tomato sauce and 100% real mozzarella, cheddar, provolone, and parmesan cheese, all piled on top of our Classic Crust that's not too thick and not too thin with just the right amount of crunch. Our delicious, melty cheese pizza is an excellent source of protein and calcium so you can feel good about every single slice you serve. Whether it's part of a mid-week family dinner, a late-night study session with friends, or a quick snack before sports practice, let our frozen pizzas help you and the people you love savor every moment. Easy to make and easier to enjoy, this frozen pizza serves up quality and flavor in just 18-21 minutes, so you can get back to what matters. No matter the occasion, you can count on RED BARON pizza to please the crowd. You can quickly bake our frozen pizza as part of an easy dinner, giving your family more time to catch up over every cheesy bite. Everyone at your next pizza party will buzz about the perfect crust that's not too thin and not too thick, with just the right amount of crunch! And you'll feel the pride and excitement of bringing people together to share a delicious meal-and lots of memorable moments-again and again. Make your next meal mean more with a RED BARON Classic Crust Four Cheese Pizza.

Walmart’s Great Value brand provides Canadian families with everyday value that does not compromise on quality. All Great Value products come with a 100% satisfaction guarantee, or your money back. With Great Value, you can feel confident that you are making a great choice!

Great Value™ Mozza-Cheddar Shredded Cheese unites two all-time cheese MVPs for your eating enjoyment! We’ve paired pizza mozzarella and mild cheddar for the ultimate feel-good shredded cheese combo. Our cheese shreds melt with ease, making them a must for comfort food dishes like mac n’ cheese, loaded potatoes, cheesesteak sandwiches and more.

Made with 100% Canadian milk.

The Ingredient Wise™ symbol appears on Great Value products made without these ingredients: synthetic colours, artificial flavours and sweeteners, hydrogenated vegetable oil, monosodium glutamate.

product_name: Dairyland Fat Free Cottage Cheese, 500 g
short_description: No matter when or how you have it, Dairyland cottage cheese is always a nutritious choice worth making. Enjoy the rich and creamy taste of our plain cottage cheese as the key ingredient in your favourite recipe. Or, if you need a high protein snack for the road, our light cottage cheese single serve cups are the perfect travel companion. Proud to be recognized as the Most Trusted Brand* in Canada delivering the best quality milk and cultured products for more than 100 years. We are committed to caring for our communities and providing consumers with delicious dairy made with 100% Canadian milk. *Voted most trusted brand in the Milk category, based on the 2024 BrandSpark Canadian Shopper Study

product_name: Daiya Dairy Free Cheddar Cheese Slices, 220g
short_description:
Is there any comfort food more iconic than cheese? Our plant based cheese melts like dairy, tastes like dairy, and even looks like dairy...minus the actual dairy. We're reimagining the way plant based cheese is made, combining traditional cheesemaking methods with the goodness of oat. Our dairy free cheese is made with Daiya Oat Cream™ blend, for a cheesy, "melts-like-dairy" experience that comforts the way cheese should. Just like dairy cheese, our dairy free cheese slices can be enjoyed hot or cold. Smooth, creamy, and flavourful, these versatile slices are ready to top all your burgers and sandwiches with some cheesy perfection.

Grilled cheese? Yes please! With a smooth texture and slightly sharp taste, our dairy free Cheddar Slices can better any burger, sandwich or crunchy crackers. Yep, these dairy free cheddar cheese slices are so delicious, you can enjoy them all on their own. Mmm.

product_name: Daiya Dairy Free Mozzarella Cheese Shreds, 200g
short_description:
Is there any comfort food more iconic than cheese? Our new plant based cheese melts like dairy, tastes like dairy, and even looks like dairy...minus the actual dairy. We're reimagining the way plant based cheese is made, combining traditional cheesemaking methods with the goodness of oat. Our new & improved dairy free cheese is now made with Daiya Oat Cream™ blend, for a cheesy, "melts-like-dairy" experience that comforts the way cheese should. These dairy free cheese shreds are delicious with crepes and tacos, and perfect on the top of pizzas, pastas and mac & cheese - any of your favorite comfort foods that call for melted cheese.

Mild, milky, and buttery, our dairy free mozzarella cheese shreds give you the perfect melt every time. Sprinkle them on homemade pizza, saucy pasta or a meatball sub. These classic shreds are more like dairy than ever before - a velvety melt, smooth texture and cheesy flavour, with none of the compromise.

product_name: Activia Expert Yogurt, Pre & Probiotics, Plain, 750g, Activia Expert Plain 750g
short_description: Spoon it straight, stir it into oats, or blend it into savoury sauces—Activia Plain is as versatile as it is nourishing. Its mild, creamy texture makes it a natural fit for any time of day. Prepared in Canada, it’s enriched with B.L. Regularis (Bifidobacterium lactis CNCM I-2494) and 2.5 g of inulin per 115 g, a prebiotic fibre that helps support gut health when consumed in adequate amounts regularly. Simplicity and satisfaction, together in every spoonful.

Thanks to his commitment to delivering delicious ice cream using only local and simple ingredients, the Breyers brand was soon loved by customers far and wide! product_name: Ben & Jerry's Brownie Batter Core Ice Cream, 473 mL
short_description: Ben & Jerry's chocolate & vanilla ice creams, with fudge brownies and a brownie batter core, this flavour takes its brownies seriously. So, nothing would do but to have two: fully baked brownies scattered liberally throughout chocolate and vanilla ice creams, and gooey, unbaked brownie batter at the core.Sure, we’re a little biased about spoons around here; if your ice cream is having such a melt-down that you’re slurping it through a straw, it’d darned well better be in a glass and called a milkshake. We’re definitely all about the spoon here, so it didn’t take us long to realize that our favourite way to eat brownies was with our favourite utensil, straight out of the mixing bowl. But listen: we’ve got nothing against the folks who love the crispy edges on a pan of cooked brownies, or even those who eat their brownies with a fork and knife (even though we think it’s somewhat strange). So, we decided to meet in the [ooey, gooey, brownie batter-filled] middle: batter-lovers can sink a spoon into the Core, while fully baked brownie lovers get their fix around the edges. Happy bellies all around.All of Ben & Jerry’s cocoa, sugar and vanilla comes from Fairtrade certified producers. Our ice cream is made with non-GMO sourced ingredients, cage-free eggs and certified Canadian dairy.

Whether you’re streaming a laugh-out-loud comedy, an edge-of-your-seat drama, or a hey-I-didn’t-know-that documentary, it’s incomplete without a tasty treat and a few of your favourite friends. And with the perfect balance of sweet, salty, and chocolatey, Ben & Jerry's Netflix & Chilll'd is the ideal flavour accompaniment for all your favourite Netflix shows. Follow the sweet and salty pretzel swirls like you follow the plot twists of your favourite drama, or dig out a brownie piece every time you laugh out loud at that new comedy special. With a spoonful of peanut butter ice cream and your remote in hand, there’s nothing but euphoria in your future. Go forth and chillax, flavour warrior. Netflix & Chilll'd is made with Fairtrade certified sugar and vanilla, and all the ingredients are non-GMO sourced. We also use eggs from cage-free hens. Now that’s something you can feel wonderful about! This ice cream pint, like every pint we make, also features responsibly sourced packaging.

short_description: At Magnum, we believe that a day without pleasure is a day lost: Magnum's “Doubles” range of ice cream bars offers our ultimate indulgence for true pleasure seekers. Each ice cream bar is made with velvety smooth ice cream and is covered in a chocolatey layer, a layer of luscious sauce, and a final thick chocolate coating made with unsweetened Belgian chocolate. The result is the perfect combination of delicious flavours and textures in every bite. Magnum Double Caramel ice cream bars offer our ultimate delight for the senses: vanilla bean ice cream dipped in a chocolatey coating, rich caramel sauce, and milk chocolate. Our golden caramel sauce that covers the vanilla ice cream is basically pampered in Magnum chocolate. Available in both full-sized and mini bars. Bite into this luxurious treat unlike any other. Each flavour is made with Belgian chocolate that uses cocoa beans sourced from Rainforest Alliance Certified farms. Belgian chocolate has an outstanding reputation for its smooth, rich flavour and tempting chocolate aroma. It's recognized around the world because of its meticulous adherence to ‘Old World' craftsmanship. Magnum ice cream bars are crafted in this rich heritage and are made with a signature Belgian chocolate recipe developed specifically for us. While still warm, this delicious coating wraps around our velvety ice creams, instantly cooling to leave our signature solid, thick shell ready and waiting to be cracked. product_name: Popsicle Revello Frozen Dairy Dessert Bars, 12 x 60 ml bars
short_description: Enjoy this family favourite, Popsicle Revello Frozen Dairy Dessert Bars is one of our most classic Popsicles! A creamy vanilla dairy bar surrounded by a thick, chocolatey coating, this frozen treat is great for any time of the year. They are also made with colours and flavours from natural sources, making them the perfect frozen dessert for the whole family. Ideal for any occasion, serve them at a party or keep them in the freezer for an after-dinner frozen snack. Popsicle pops have been a treasured treat for over 100 years and remain a Canadian family favourite. The very first Popsicle® ice pop was created way back in 1905 by an 11-year-old named Frank Epperson. That’s right, Popsicle was invented by a kid. After a long day of play, Frank went inside, but left his cup of soda with the stirring stick still in it out on the porch. The night got cold, and when Frank went outside the next morning, he found his drink frozen like an icicle. Frank called his invention the “Epsicle.” It was a hit with the kids at school, and later with his kids, who called it “Pop’s sicle.” The name was catchy, and the treat was delicious, so Frank patented it in 1923 to share his Popsicle ice pops with the world. A lot has happened since 1905, when the first Popsicle ice pop was made. Be sure to try our other products in the Popsicle® family and discover your favourite frozen treat, including our delicious Cyclone Popsicle® and malty fudge chocolate Popsicle Fudgsicle® bar.

short_description: Ben & Jerry's caramel and chocolate ice creams with crunchy chocolate cookie swirls and gobs of chocolate chip cookie dough and peanut butter cookie dough. One of our most popular flavours since launching in 2015, The Tonight Dough was created with Jimmy Fallon to celebrate his takeover of The Tonight Show, the longest running talk show in TV history. As big and bold as Fallon himself, the flavour stands out as one of Ben & Jerry’s chunkiest, doughiest, most-over-the-top ice creams yet. But the Ben & Jerry's flavour’s success is even sweeter because Fallon donates all his proceeds from the sale of The Tonight Dough to the SeriousFun Children’s Network. Feel good about your choice of Ben & Jerry's, knowing you’re helping children with serious illnesses and their families enjoy life-changing experiences at a camp that fosters growth and happiness – free of charge. The best ice cream is nothing without great ingredients. Like every flavour, The Tonight Dough is made with pure 100% Canadian milk and eggs from free run hens. Fairtrade and Non-GMO certified producers supply the cocoa, sugar, and vanilla. Our Canadian Dairy Farmers and their herds of cows deliver our milk and cream, and our product chills inside your freezer in responsibly sourced packaging.

product_name: Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Fudge Brownie Ice Cream, 473 mL
short_description: Fudgy chunks of brownie goodness mixed into dark and rich chocolate ice cream. Sounds like a dream. At first, that’s all it was. Long ago, we were making brownie ice cream sandwiches for sale in grocery stores. Sometimes there would be broken pieces in the brownie delivery, and we’d nab them for flavour experiments. What would brownie pieces taste like in chocolate ice cream? Pretty good, as it turns out! That original experimental flavour eventually became the legendary ice cream concoction known as Chocolate Fudge Brownie. Meanwhile, Ben Cohen had met Bernie Glassman, the founder of Greyston Bakery, a Yonkers, New York, USA-based company with a mission to end poverty and give back to the community. Equally important, their brownies were just so darn good—after sampling some, Ben handwrote a note asking for two truckloads of brownie pieces. While we knew Greyston would be the ideal supplier for turning Chocolate Fudge Brownie into a flavour sold by the tub, getting the brownies to cooperate wasn’t easy. After about 25 batches of brownies and six months of work, the flavour finally debuted in 1991, and it’s been a hit ever since. All the cocoa, sugar and vanilla Ben & Jerry's ice cream uses is Fairtrade certified, and the milk and cream comes from Canadian Dairy farmers. Greyston Bakery, one of the largest social enterprises in the USA, continues to provide the brownies for this and all of our brownie flavours. Our ice cream is made with 1% Canadian milk, free run eggs and Non-GMO ingredients. And all our packaging is responsibly sourced.

DRUMSTICK, the original sundae cone experience since 1928.

product_name: Ben & Jerry's Peanut Butter Half Baked Ice Cream, 473ml
short_description: A delightfully euphoric combination of chocolate and peanut butter ice creams with fudge brownies and gobs of peanut butter cookie dough. Can’t you just taste the awesome? Of course, you can! A special twist on our most popular flavour, Peanut Butter Half Baked makes the best even better with a gooey, gobbly, chunkalicious mix of fudgy brownies and peanut butter cookie dough. For peanut butter lovers, it’s a swirl of ice cream euphoria that simply can’t be beat. And for all you Half-Baked purists who call it sacrilege, grab a spoon and prepare to have your world flipped upside down.This flavour doesn’t just taste delicious but does good, too, by sourcing the fresh-baked brownies from fellow B Corp, Greyston Bakery, located in Yonkers, New York. Since 1982, this social enterprise has been paving the way to success for many of the city’s low-income residents through employment and education.The positive impact on both people and the planet doesn’t stop there. Like all of Ben & Jerry's flavours, Peanut Butter Half Baked is lovingly crafted with Non-GMO ingredients, 1% Canadian milk, eggs from free run hens, and kosher-certified milk and cream. Fairtrade certified suppliers provide the cocoa, sugar, and vanilla, plus the packaging is responsibly sourced.

product_name: Ben & Jerry's Cherry Garcia® Ice Cream, 473 mL
short_description: Cherry ice cream with cherries and fudge flakes. It’s our tribute to legendary guitarist Jerry Garcia fans everywhere, and it all started with a piece of fan mail. You see, back in the day, before smartphones and social media, our fans spoke to us via handwritten notes pinned to the bulletin boards at our Scoop Shops. It was sometime in 1986 when one such fan was persistent enough to mail a postcard to our main office in Burlington, Vermont. Ice cream meets great guitar solos? It was genius, and Ben immediately began creating the iconic concoction. Cherry Garcia debuted in 1987 and quickly became one of our top three most popular flavours. In fact, the first eight pints went straight to Mr. Garcia himself and were met with two thumbs up! As for the fan who sent in the anonymous postcard? Our sleuths finally found her and thanked her with a trip to Vermont and a year’s supply of Ben & Jerry’s ice cream. It’s been a long, strange trip ever since, but what remains is Ben & Jerry's commitment to producing the best responsible ice cream. Like all of our flavours, Cherry Garcia is made with 1% Canadian milk, free run eggs, Non-GMO, and Fairtrade certified cocoa and vanilla. The milk and cream is kosher-certified and comes from Canadian cows. Responsibly sourced packaging gets the goodness from our factory to your freezer.

short_description: Indulge in the delightful taste of America’s #1 Indian ice cream brand, now available in Canada! Each creamy spoonful is inspired by the classic Royal Falooda flavor, a beloved dessert known for its luxurious layers of flavors, including rose, saffron, and chewy vermicelli, topped with a medley of nuts. Crafted with care, this ice cream is made from 100% milk and is 100% vegetarian, ensuring that every bite is not only delicious but also of the highest quality. Plus, you can enjoy it guilt-free—it's made without eggs, preservatives, or artificial flavors. The delightful combination of traditional Indian ingredients creates an experience that’s perfect for any occasion—whether you’re enjoying a family gathering or celebrating with friends. Each scoop captures the essence of this iconic dessert, inviting you to savor the indulgent taste of Royal Falooda. This ice cream is not just a dessert; it’s a celebration of flavor and tradition that brings joy with every bite. Treat yourself to this delectable fusion of taste and culture, and discover why this ice cream has captured the hearts of so many. Whether you’re a long-time fan of Indian desserts or trying it for the first time, this delightful flavor promises to satisfy your sweet tooth and leave you craving more. Don’t miss out on this unique flavor sensation—experience the joy of Royal Falooda ice cream today!

Our thoughtful Ingredients support positive change and make our ice cream taste sensational! Ben and Jerry's ice cream is proudly made with Fairtrade certified ingredients like bananas, coffee, cocoa, sugar, and vanilla. Our ice cream also uses only milk certified by Dairy Farmers of Canada, non-GMO ingredients, and cage-free eggs from free-grazing hens. This delicious frozen treat is also certified kosher. At Ben & Jerry’s, we believe that business can be a huge catalyst to stand up for justice in society. Through activism, advocacy, and our everyday business activities around the globe, we’re working to deliver justice in all its flavours. At Ben & Jerry's, we are on a three-part mission that aims to create prosperity for everyone connected to our ice cream business: suppliers, employees, farmers, franchisees, customers, & neighbours

product_name: Frostline Vanilla Soft Serve Ice Cream Mix Lactose Free 6 lb
short_description:
Hello there, ice cream enthusiasts!

Do you dream of creamy, dreamy, soft serve ice cream on demand, but can't justify the late-night run to your local ice cream shop? Well, buckle up because we're about to turn your kitchen into a gourmet ice cream parlor. Meet the Frostline 6 lb. Vanilla Soft Serve Ice Cream Mix!

This isn't just an ice cream mix. This is your ticket to creamy, soft, and oh-so-flavorful homemade soft serve that rivals any high-end ice cream shop. product_name: Frostline Chocolate Soft Serve Ice Cream Mix Lactose Free 6 lb
short_description:
Quickly and easily prepare large batches of soft serve ice cream with the Frostline chocolate soft serve ice cream mix. Delivering a rich chocolate flavor with a creamy mouthfeel, this versatile soft serve mix is delicious on its own or can be used to create an endless number of recipes for your menu. Offering a great base for many mix in options, use it as a foundation for candy add-ins and toppings to serve delicious sundaes or trendy dipped cones. Or, mix with other Frostline soft serve flavors to create customer-favorite twists. In addition to soft serve ice cream, this mix can be used in granita or milkshake machines to make frozen beverages and shakes, including alcohol-infused beverages for your of-age crowd! Use it to create anything from a simple chocolate shake to a boozy chocolate martini. Perfect for ice cream shops, snack bars, and buffets, the mix is low in fat and cholesterol-, gluten-, and lactose-free, allowing you to service a wider variety of diets.

This shelf stable dry mix provides easier handling and storage than ready-to-use fresh dairy and it provides a more consistent flavor and texture from batch to batch. Best of all, preparation is quick and easy to help you keep up with high demand and ensure optimal freshness when serving. Simply fill a clean mixing bucket with 2 gallons (8 quarts) of cold water and add in one bag of Frostline soft serve mix to the bucket. Stir with a wire whisk for approximately 2 minutes or until the dry mix is completely dissolved. Pour the mixture into your commercial soft serve machine or cover and store in your refrigerator. Each bag yields approximately (88) 2/3 cups servings, providing you with an ample supply for your business.

A leader in the frozen shelf-stable frozen treats industry, Frostline is a brand name that is synonymous with quality and great taste. Servicing a wide variety of operations, their product portfolio includes soft serve mixes, frozen yogurt mixes, and frozen beverage mixes, and their selection of both classic and on-trend flavors offers a delicious option for nearly every customer. The shelf-stable mixes are easy to ship, store, and prepare, resulting in a higher profit margin for your business than traditional dairy mixes without compromising on the creamy taste and texture your customers expect. Providing you with menu versatility and profitability, Frostline frozen treats offer an excellent addition to your establishment!

Suggested Recipe: ChocoLatte Soft Serve

1 bag Frostline chocolate soft serve mix
2 gallons coffee, chilled

Fill a clean mixing bowl with 2 gallons (8 quarts) of chilled coffee and add the Frostline mix into the bucket. Stir with a wire whisk for approximately 2 minutes or until the dry mix is completely dissolved. Pour the mixture into your commercial soft serve machine or cover and store in your refrigerator

Proudly crafted in Ontario, Canada, DRUMSTICK Vanilla Caramel is made with Canadian dairy and has no artificial colours. Create some joyful memories with DRUMSTICK Vanilla Caramel frozen dessert and try our other DRUMSTICK tub flavours -- Strawberry Cheesecake and Chocolate Fudge Brownie. DRUMSTICK, the original sundae cone experience since 1928.

product_name: Blueberry Swirl Frozen Yogurt, Vanilla With Fruit Ripple, Prepared In Canada With 100% Canadian Milk, No Artificial Flavours Or Colours, 946 mL
short_description: Look for delicious iÖGO Blueberry Swirl Frozen Yogurt in the grocery Ice Cream and Frozen Dessert aisle. Proudly prepared in Canada, this delectable treat combines sweet, savoury blueberries with the richness of 100% Canadian milk, delivering an authentic taste experience in every spoonful. iÖGO prioritizes quality, so Blueberry Swirl Frozen Yogurt is made with real fruit and real dairy, ensuring a wholesome indulgence free from artificial colours and flavours (non-artificial colours are prepared from natural sources). This commitment to authentic ingredients results in a smooth and satisfying frozen yogurt that all ages will enjoy. Whether you're seeking a refreshing break, a delightful dessert, an addition to your favourite smoothie, or the perfect treat to share, this iÖGO Frozen Yogurt offers a harmonious blend of vanilla frozen yogurt and savoury blueberry swirls throughout for a soothing flavour profile that provides pure enjoyment. Real fruit, real dairy, real fun…in every scoop!

product_name: Chapman's Yukon Lynx Chocolate Éclair Crunch in a Box, 6 x 90 mL
short_description: These Great Canadian Yukon bars are as BIG on taste as they are on crunch! Bursting with flavour and texture, Chocolate Éclair Crunch Yukon Bars feature velvety vanilla and rich chocolate ice cream, covered in crisp milk chocolate and sprinkled with lavish chunks of chocolate and vanilla cookie. Made with 100% Canadian dairy, this product is carefully crafted with premium ingredients using natural colours and flavours. A perfect on-the-go snack!

product_name: DOLE SOFT SERVE Mango Soft Serve Mix 4.5 lb/2.04 kgs
short_description:
Let's dive right into the star of the show: the flavor. This soft serve mix is like capturing the essence of a sun-kissed mango and transforming it into a velvety, dreamy dessert. Each spoonful is a tropical explosion that will transport you to a hammock on a sandy beach. It's like sipping a mango smoothie while basking in the Caribbean sun—pure bliss in every bite!

Now, let's talk about the convenience factor. Say goodbye to fruitless searches for mango-flavored treats. With this mix, you can be the captain of your own mango ship, sailing through a sea of deliciousness. Simply add water to the mix, fire up your soft serve machine, and prepare to be whisked away to a paradise of flavor. It's like having a personal mango oasis in your kitchen, where you're the ruler of all things tropical.

But wait, there's more! This soft serve mix isn't just a one-trick pony. It's versatile enough to please any crowd. Hosting a summer barbecue? Whip up a batch of refreshing mango soft serve to cool down your guests. Running an ice cream shop? Watch as customers line up for a taste of this exotic delight. It's a dessert that brings smiles and makes taste buds do the hula.

And here's a juicy bonus: it's gluten-free! So whether you're living a gluten-conscious lifestyle or have friends with dietary restrictions, everyone can join in on the mango madness. We believe that nobody should be left out of the tropical party.

Picture yourself lounging under a palm tree, the warm breeze gently rustling the leaves, and a bowl of creamy, mango-infused happiness in your hand. It's like a vacation for your taste buds, a momentary escape to a tropical paradise. Let the smooth texture and tangy sweetness transport you to a land of pure delight.

So, why settle for boring desserts when you can embark on a mango-filled journey with the Dole 4.5 lb Mango Soft Serve Mix Case? Order yours today and get ready for a tropical fiesta. Prepare to indulge in a flavor sensation that will make your taste buds do the samba. Life is too short to skip out on the mango madness, my friend. Embrace the mango revolution and let the mango-lover in you shine!

product_name: Fabbri 1.5 kg Vanilla Simple One-Step Soft Serve / Frozen Dessert Mix
short_description: Create premium Italian-inspired desserts and frozen treats with the help ofthis Fabbri Simple vanilla one-step soft serve / frozen dessert mix. Asconsumers continue to expand their palettes and explore other cultures'cuisines, this Simple frozen dessert paste offers the ideal solution to easilyintroduce authentic Italian gelato and sorbetto to your menu! It delivers asweet and creamy vanilla flavor that is great for making soft serve ice creamor using as a base to create marbled gelato. Additionally this versatile pastecan be used as a base to create flavorful granitas, smoothies, and milkshakes.    Providing all of the main ingredients needed to create delicious frozendesserts, this paste helps save on prep time, labor costs, and the hassle ofmeasuring out ingredients while still offering a gourmet, handcrafted taste.To prepare, simply mix 1 can of Simple frozen dessert paste with 1-1.5 gallonsof milk, cream, or water. Let the mixture stand for 10 minutes and then addthe mixture to your soft serve or gelato machine. Follow your equipmentspecific instructions to prepare the batch.    With humble beginnings in 1905, Fabbri started out as an Italian liqueurscompany. Famous for its Amarena cherries, the company soon expanded toalcoholic and non-alcoholic syrups, gelato, and fruit purees. A dedication totradition and innovation has allowed the company to continually grow and adaptto changing markets to bring quality products to bartenders, pastry chefs, andfood service professionals worldwide.

Ice Cream Blender

Our ice cream blender features a body and blending head made of durable 304 stainless steel, ensuring efficient and stable operation. It is long-lasting, easy to clean, and significantly enhances your productivity.

Enhanced Stability

product_name: VEVOR Commercial Ice Cream Machine, 10.6 QT/H Yield, 1000W Single Flavor Countertop Soft Serve Ice Cream Maker, 4L Hopper 1.6L Cylinder, Touch Screen Auto Clean Pre-cooling, for Restaurant Snack Bar
short_description:
Product Description

Commercial Soft-Serve Ice Cream Machine
This commercial desktop ice cream maker is designed for efficient and simple operation, enabling the production of high-quality ice cream in just 15 minutes. With a quiet yet powerful compressor, it has a 1.6L capacity and can produce up to 10L of ice cream per hour. The machine features advanced puffing technology for smoother ice cream, allowing hardness adjustments to tailor the product to individual tastes. Constructed from durable stainless steel with a food-grade stainless steel cylinder, it ensures longevity and ease of cleaning. Ideal for commercial settings such as ice cream shops, cafes, and small food stalls.
Countertop Ice Cream Machine
This commercial desktop ice cream maker produces ice cream in just 15 minutes. With a powerful compressor that operates quietly at less than 66 dB. It can continuously deliver 4 to 6 ice cream balls, reaching up to 10L/2.7 gal of ice cream per hour for the perfect smooth, creamy texture mix.
Soft Serve Ice Cream
Features built-in puffing technology to enhance ice cream's air contact for a smoother texture using the same amount of ingredients. The hardness adjustment function allows for customizing the texture according to personal preferences, ensuring every serving is as desired.
Stainless Steel Construction
Crafted from high-grade stainless steel with a 304 food-grade stainless steel cylinder, this ice cream machine soft serve offers increased durability and ease of cleaning. Its rust-resistant properties ensure longevity and hygiene in commercial settings.
Optimized Cooling System
Equipped with a high-speed rotating mechanism and an effective cooling system, including a built-in copper tube condenser and large area side vents. This design ensures even cooling and heat dissipation, promoting consistent ice cream texture and firmness.
Versatile Commercial Use
Ideal for a variety of commercial venues including ice cream shops, cafes, burger joints, drink bars, and small food stalls. The ice cream maker machine soft serve's compact size and efficient output make it a valuable addition to any food service establishment.
Refrigeration and Heat Dissipation
The integrated 1.6L (1.7QT) cooling tank and fast-rotating triple mixer are engineered to create creamy, silky-smooth ice cream textures, enhancing the overall quality and appeal of the ice cream served.

Specifications

Item Model Number: BQL-9200ST
Operating Temperature: 5-32°C / 41-89.6°F
Ice Cream Production Efficiency: 10L /2.7Gal per Hour
Ingredient Tank Capacity: 4L / 1.1 Gal
Cylinder Capacity: 1.6L / 0.4 Gal
Noise Level: ≤66 dB
Hopper Material: Stainless Steel 304
Main Material: Stainless Steel 201
Net Weight: 45kg / 99.2 lbs

Package Content

Ice Cream Maker x 1
Star Nut x 1
Corrugated Tube x 1
Plunger O-Rings x 2
Expansion Tube x 1
Petroleum Jelly x 1

product_name: McCain® 9 Minute No Flip Potato Patties, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 600g
short_description: Elevate breakfast time with crispy, savoury potato patties in under 10 minutes—no flipping required. McCain® 9 Minute No Flip Potato Patties make it easy to serve up delicious, restaurant-level golden potato goodness straight from your air fryer or oven at home. A satisfying solution for fast-paced mornings, our premium frozen potato patties are a family favourite. Made with specially selected potatoes and simple ingredients, McCain Hashbrowns contain no artificial flavours, hydrogenated oils, trans fat or cholesterol. There’s no need to hover over a hot pan with these no-flip potato patties, simply place them in a single layer in your pre-heated air fryer or oven and they’ll cook up crispy and delicious to a light golden colour in minutes. A versatile morning staple, enjoy these 9-Minute Potato Patties on their own as quick and crispy breakfast treats on busy weekdays or savour as go-to sides in leisurely weekend brunches with friends and family. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 390°F (200°C), arrange frozen patties in a single layer on bottom of basket, air fry for 7-11 minutes to a light golden colour. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C), spread frozen patties in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 9-11 minutes. Not recommended for cooking in a microwave. See full details on packaging.

product_name: McCain® Classic Hash Brown Potato Patties, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 20 Pack
short_description: Take breakfast to the next level with McCain® Classic Hash Brown Potato Patties. These convenient hash browns cook up crispy and golden in your air fryer or oven, helping you to create restaurant-quality breakfasts in the comfort of your own home. Made with quality potatoes, McCain Hashbrowns are low in saturated fat and free of trans fat and cholesterol. A convenient meal option to help fuel your day, these frozen potato patties can be enjoyed on their own as easy crispy breakfast treats on busy weekdays or savoured as go-to sides during leisurely brunches on weekends and holidays. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 360°F (182°C), arrange frozen patties in a single layer on bottom of basket, air fry for 11-13 minutes to a light golden colour. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C), spread frozen patties in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 26-30 minutes, turning halfway through. Not recommended for cooking in a microwave. See full details on packaging.

product_name: McCain® Savoury Homefries, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 650g
short_description: McCain® Savoury Homefries take a classic diner favourite and elevate it with a subtle coating of garlic, onion, herbs and spices. Pop them in the oven and bake them or enjoy quick and delicious air fryer home fries in minutes, however you prepare them you’re in for a treat. Our frozen savoury home fries contain no artificial flavours, hydrogenated oils, trans fat or cholesterol, so you can always feel good about sharing these crispy home fries with your friends and family. Enjoy McCain home fries for breakfast on their own, as a savoury side dish, or add them to your favourite bacon and eggs recipes to elevate any brunch menu—there’s no wrong way to enjoy these crispy classics. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 390°F (200°C), fill basket halfway with frozen homefries, air fry for 14-16 minutes to a light golden colour, sliding basket out and shaking halfway through. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C), spread frozen homefries in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 21-25 minutes, turning halfway through. Not recommended for cooking in a microwave. product_name: McCain® Potato Pancakes, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 600g
short_description: McCain® Potato Pancakes bring everyone to the breakfast table with a tempting blend of real shredded potatoes and light seasoning. Made with specially selected potatoes and simple ingredients, these easy potato pancakes contain no artificial flavours, hydrogenated oils, trans fat or cholesterol. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 330°F (165°C), arrange frozen potato pancakes in a single layer on bottom of basket, air fry for 9-11 minutes to a light golden colour. Pan - Heat a small amount of cooking oil in a non-stick frying pan, add frozen potato pancakes in a single layer, cook on medium-high for 14-18 minutes, turning halfway through. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C), spread frozen potato pancakes in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 18-20 minutes, turning halfway through. Not recommended for cooking in a microwave. product_name: Y&Y black glutinous rice, 2 kg
short_description: Immerse yourself in the rich and nutty flavor of Y&Y Black Glutinous Rice, a premium variety of rice that offers a unique culinary experience. Also known as "black sticky rice" or "forbidden rice," this heirloom grain is prized for its striking color, chewy texture, and nutty taste. Whether used in sweet desserts, savory dishes, or as a base for colorful rice bowls, Y&Y Black Glutinous Rice adds depth and sophistication to your culinary creations. Y&Y black glutinous rice. While many whole grains contain gluten, black rice is a nutritious, naturally gluten-free option that can be enjoyed by those on a gluten-free diet. Black rice is naturally gluten-free and can be a good option for those with celiac disease or gluten sensitivity. Black rice is healthy, packed with protein and fiber. Learn how to cook black rice using black sticky rice (black glutinous rice), and make this Southeast Asian sweet dessert. Usage Suggestions: • Desserts: Use black glutinous rice to make traditional Asian desserts such as black rice pudding, sweet rice cakes, or coconut black rice. • Savory Dishes: Incorporate into savory dishes like black rice risotto, rice salads, or stuffed bell peppers for a unique twist on classic recipes. • Breakfast Porridge: Cook black glutinous rice with coconut milk and sweeteners to create a creamy and indulgent breakfast porridge. • Colorful Rice Bowls: Use cooked black glutinous rice as a base for vibrant rice bowls topped with colorful vegetables, proteins, and sauces. Experience the depth of flavor and versatility of Y&Y Black Glutinous Rice in your culinary creations. Whether you're cooking traditional Asian recipes or experimenting with fusion cuisine, this nutrient-rich rice variety is sure to impress with its distinctive taste and beautiful presentation.

product_name: Red Keeri Raw Samba Divine Rice (8LB)
short_description:
Red Keeri Raw Samba Rice is a unique variety of rice that is cherished for its small grain size and distinct taste. It is known for being smooth and having a separate taste and aroma, which makes it a preferred choice for many traditional dishes. This variety of rice is unboiled, leaving the grain slightly smaller and therefore lighter than the parboiled version.

Here are some key characteristics and benefits of Red Keeri Raw Samba Rice:

  • High in Fiber: It has a high fiber content, which is beneficial for digestion and maintaining a healthy digestive system
  • Low Glycemic Index (GI): The low GI of this rice makes it a healthier option for those managing blood sugar levels, as it helps in controlling the rise in blood sugar after meals
  • Rich in Nutrients: Red Keeri Raw Samba Rice contains essential vitamins such as Thiamin, Riboflavin, Niacin, and Vitamin E, as well as minerals like Iron and Zinc
  • Distinctive Flavor: Its unique flavor profile makes it suitable for a variety of dishes, including fried rice and biryani, and it pairs well with different cuisines

product_name: Pack of 4 - Lundberg Organic Basmati Rice - Regenerative Organic Certified Long Grain White Rice, Fluffy & Aromatic, Gluten Free, Resealable 907g Bag
short_description: White Basmati has always been a family favorite for its versatility and pleasant aroma. This long, thin grain is light and won't clump together when cooked, making it a natural fit for curry, stir-fry, salad, pilaf, and dessert recipes that call for distinct kernels with a fluffy texture. Since 1937, Lundberg Family Farms has been growing wholesome, great-tasting rice while tending to soil, air, water, and wildlife as carefully as our crops. Some people say we're a bit unconventional. But doing things our way - sustainably at every step - allows us to make better food for your table while leaving a better world for the next generation. Grown with earth-preserving practices, our 17+ rice varieties are cultivated to maximize the flavor of each tiny grain. Long, short, black, brown, white, red, and blended. Each variety brings something different to the table so you can get creative in the kitchen. Hungry for more? Look for other great-tasting side dishes, rice cakes, snacks, and packaged rice varieties from Lundberg Family Farms.

product_name: Chandni Chowk Sela Basmati Rice 40lb
short_description: Chandni Chowk Sela Basmati Rice is premium extra-long grain Sella basmati rice. Upon cooking the rice grains can elongate to at least twice their original size, and do not stick together or break. It is perfect for cooking Biryani, Zarda & Pulao in large quantities.

product_name: Pride Of India - Extra Long Indian Golden Basmati Rice - Healthy Parboiled Sella Grain, 3 Pound Jar
short_description: Pride Of India's exclusive range of Basmati rice is cultivated in the fertile Himalayan valleys with immense care. It undergoes a unique aging process for up to two years that invigorates a rich and aromatic experience when consumed on any dinner table.

product_name: Pack of 6 - Tilda Pure Basmati Rice 907 Gram each
short_description: Highest Quality Basmati Rice grown in the foothills of the Himalayas; the best known region in the world for growing Basmati.

product_name: Super Keeri Samba Divine Rice (8LB)
short_description:
Divine Keeri Samba Rice is a special variety of Samba rice that is highly appreciated for its small, tasty grains. It’s known for its smooth texture and distinctive taste and aroma, making it an excellent choice for dishes like biryani and fried rice. This rice is gluten-free and non-sticky, which contributes to its popularity, especially for those who prefer or require gluten-free options.

The unique aroma of Divine Keeri Samba Rice is particularly suited for pairing with seafood curries, and its ability to absorb flavors makes it a versatile ingredient in a variety of culinary creations.

short_description: Green Heights bring naturally grown healthy nourishing essential food items that enhance the overall health of the human body. Our key is to integrate the century long tradition of consuming pure foods from farm to table in each spoonful of item made using Green Heights ingredients. We are a family owned company and source all our ingredients from direct farms to preserve the quality and freshness of our products. We value sustainable farming and aim to build a company that benefits the entire food chain from the grass root level upwards. Food safety is the number 1 priority for all Green Heights products as they are manufactured in American food grade, hygienic, and safe facilities.

product_name: White Raw Divine Rice (8LB)
short_description: Divine white raw rice is known for its milky taste and pure white color, making it a popular choice for breakfast in Sri Lanka. This variety of rice is raw, meaning it’s not boiled during the processing, which helps retain its nutritional value. It’s high in protein and energy, and contains nutrients like calcium, Iron, Zinc, and Sodium.

Made with clean, natural ingredients like tomatoes, corn, red kidney beans, peppers, onion, garlic, and jalapeño, this microwavable rice is free from artificial preservatives, additives, and bioengineered components. Unlike competitors that use flavor enhancers and synthetic additives, Eat Regal focuses on real food with no added sugars or artificial fortifications. Perfect for a quick, flavorful meal or as a side dish, this rice is ideal for health-conscious consumers who value simplicity and quality. Shelf-stable for easy storage, it’s an excellent option for busy families, meal prep, or on-the-go meals.

product_name: BEN'S ORIGINAL Risotto Roasted Garlic & Herb Flavour, 240g Pouch, Ben's Original Garlic Risotto
short_description: BEN'S ORIGINAL Roasted Garlic & Herb Flavour Risotto makes it easy to enjoy hassle-free, delicious risotto in just 90 seconds. This microwave risotto rice side dish delivers Arborio rice, garlic, and a variety of herbs to bring a spectacular and fragrant risotto dish to your table. BEN'S ORIGINAL Risotto rice comes in a BPA-free microwavable pouch that makes cooking easier by eliminating prep and cleanup. To get this flavoured risotto ready to serve, add 85 mL (1/3 cup) of water to the pouch, place in the microwave and cook it for 90 seconds, stir it to mix, then serve. Or, pour the contents into a skillet with 85 mL (1/3 cup) water and heat thoroughly. Serve this risotto plain for a quick bite or pair it with your favourite protein as a side dish. This risotto contains no artificial colours, flavours, or preservatives. BEN'S ORIGINAL brand is dedicated to creating meals and experiences that offer everyone a seat at the table.

product_name: Great Value Shelled Hemp Hearts, 907 g
short_description: Add a nutritious accent to main dishes and treats with Great Value Shelled Hemp Hearts. These hulled hemp seeds conveniently add the benefits of omega-3 and 6 polyunsaturated fatty acids to any meal. Sprinkle the hemp seeds over salads, soups, yogurt, or oatmeal for a boost of subtle flavour and texture. They blend easily into smoothies and snack foods to enhance the taste of your favourite recipes. Packaged in a resealable pouch, the hemp hearts stay fresh at room temperature in your pantry. Try the included recipe for delicious no-bake energy balls to bring the nutritional value of hemp hearts into your family's diet. product_name: NutriVilla Zaatar Jordanian Extra 200 g (7.1 oz) Medium Shaker
short_description:
I'm probably the only spice you could eat in a teaspoon-full because yes, I am that good!

I have a way of hitting all five flavour points on the tongue, so I go great on a lot of things! Sprinkle me on avocado, labneh, hummus, and yogourt; make a salad dressing or use as pita bread spread with olive oil. Sprinkle me on eggs or your favourite cheese (especially if melted!).

Traditionally, I'm consumed by soaking/dipping the inner part of small pieces of pita bread into extra virgin olive oil, which is then dipped into a bowl/plate full of Zaatar. This allows me to stick to the bread and transforms this plain pita into a divine, scrumptious bite of YUM!

Pro tip: I also taste amazing on roast chicken.

Ingredients: thyme, roasted sesame, sumac, spices, salt, roasted wheat.
Contains: wheat, gluten, sesame.

product_name: Rani Corn Poha 14oz (400g) ~ All Natural | Gluten Friendly | Vegan | Kosher | Indian Origin
short_description: Corn Poha is an Indian raw dried cornflakes also known as Maize Poha, Makai Poha, Makka Poha or pressed maize. An important ingredient in Indian Gujarati cuisine, the flakes are typically flattened as a snack, for breakfast or evening snack. Maize/Corn is the major raw material used for the manufacture of corn flakes. Corn Poha can be thought of as desi breakfast cereal or simply as a snack.

product_name: Barilla Rotini Pasta, Barilla Rotini 410g
short_description:
Rotini (meaning "twists"), also known as Fusilli, are two-inch lengths of thick, screw-like pasta from Northern Italy. The shape was inspired by children, since it is fun to eat and pairs well with a wide variety of pasta sauces.

At BARILLA, we're passionate about pasta. After all, we have been pasta makers since 1877. As an Italian family-owned food company, BARILLA pasta is synonymous with high quality and "al dente" perfection every time. Our Rotini pasta is made from the finest durum wheat and is non-GMO verified, peanut-free and suitable for a vegan or vegetarian diet. Perfect for pasta salads, or to mix in with pasta sauces!

short_description:
BARILLA Farfalle pasta, also known as bow-tie pasta, dating back to the 1500s, originated in the Lombardia and Emilia-Romagna part of Northern Italy. Farfalle, which means “butterfly” in Italian, are rectangular or oval pieces of pasta that are pinched in the middle. BARILLA Farfalle pasta is made with non-GMO ingredients.

At BARILLA, we're passionate about pasta. After all, we have been pasta makers since 1877. As an Italian family-owned food company, BARILLA pasta is synonymous with high quality and "al dente" perfection every time. product_name: Great Value Rich & Savoury Macaroni & Cheese with Bacon, 1 kg
short_description: Have a rich and savoury pasta dish on the table in minutes with Great Value Rich & Savoury Macaroni & Cheese with Bacon. A simple and satisfying meal solution, this convenient frozen dish pairs elbow pasta with real cheddar cheese and naturally smoked bacon. It’s designed to heat up quickly and easily in the microwave or a conventional oven, making it a great choice for busy weeknights when there’s no time to whip up a full meal from scratch. To heat the macaroni with cheese & bacon in a 1000-watt microwave, lift the corner of the plastic film and then microwave on high for 10 minutes. Remove the film and stir, then continue cooking for 5 minutes. To prepare the frozen macaroni and cheese in a conventional oven, lift the corner of the film and preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Place the tray on a baking sheet and cook on the middle rack for 30 minutes. Remove the film and stir, then continue cooking for an additional 20 to 25 minutes. See full details on packaging. product_name: Olivieri Fresh Cannelloni Chicken Prosciutto, Fresh Pasta, 540 g
short_description:
Enjoy authentic Italian flavours at your dinner table with Olivieri® Chicken & Prosciutto Cannelloni. Impress your family or guests with a sophisticated yet simple dish filled with fresh and homemade taste without any hassle. No one needs to know they were prepared in no time!

Originally a type of lasagna, these classic and fresh cannelloni are thin and smooth pasta sheets made from traditional and simple ingredients like durum wheat semolina, water and eggs, and no added preservatives. Once they are rolled and cut, they are filled to perfection with tender chicken, savoury prosciutto, and just a touch of creamy ricotta cheese.

Recipe Ideas
Cook these fresh cannelloni in two ways, either in a skillet or in the oven coated in one of our specialty fresh pasta sauces. Try them first with our tomato-based Olivieri® Creamy Rosé Sauce in this recipe for Chicken & Prosciutto Cannelloni in Rosé Sauce. Check out our gnocchi recipes for even more fabulous dinner ideas.

product_name: Kraft Dinner Alfredo Macaroni and Cheese, 175g
short_description: Kraft Dinner Alfredo Macaroni and Cheese is a convenient boxed dinner. A delicious twist on the classic comfort food, kids and adults love the rich taste of macaroni with alfredo cheesy goodness. This handy dinner includes macaroni and alfredo flavor cheese sauce mix, so you just need milk and margarine or butter to make a tasty family meal or a quick dinner for kids. For over 75 years, Kraft Dinner has been Canada’s family favorite. And just looking at that box, you can almost taste why. The classic smiling macaroni drenched in creamy cheese sauce will make you fall in love with every bite. Introduced in 1937, it’s been bringing gooey, cheesy smiles to peoples’ faces everywhere.

product_name: Rana Italian Sausage Ravioli, 300 g
short_description:
Since 1962, our passion for pasta has driven us to choose only ingredients from the finest sources, in keeping with our Italian tradition. All Giovanni Rana products are made with non-GMO ingredients* and, many of our ingredients also bear the D.O.P. (Protected Designation of Origin) classification. This means they come from a particular region and are made in a particular way, protecting their integrity. Our commitment to high quality, authentic ingredients is a difference you can taste and share with those you love.

ITALIAN SAUSAGE RAVIOLI

Hearty pieces of perfectly seasoned mild Italian Sausage combined with creamy cheeses for the perfect balance of spicy flavour.

product_name: Pasta Zing Spaghetti Pasta, 7.05 oz (Pack of 7)
short_description: Looking for a quick meal without sacrificing flavor or quality? Meet Pasta Zing Spaghetti Pasta—your new go-to for easy dinners, microwave meals, or lunch to-go. Fully cooked and microwaveable in just 55 Seconds, this ready to eat pasta is made from 100% Italian durum wheat semolina and water—nothing artificial. Whether you’re prepping weeknight dinners, packing lunch for work, or stocking your pantry with prepared foods, Pasta Zing delivers taste and convenience in one perfect pouch. It’s non-GMO, BPA-free, and has no added preservatives, making it a great choice for health-conscious eaters and fans of clean label meals. Each pouch is shelf-stable for up to 24 months—ideal for emergency food kits, college dorm meals, or your next camping trip. It’s certified Halal and Kosher, making it a smart option for a variety of lifestyles. From healthy meals to family dinners, this microwavable food fits right into your routine. Perfect for those searching for prepared meals ready to eat, instant pasta, or gluten free pasta alternatives (note: contains gluten), Pasta Zing satisfies your cravings with real Italian taste—without the long prep time.

short_description:
Elevate your culinary creations with Arrezzio Classi Pasta Cavatappi Scoobi Doo. This short cut dry pasta shape, made from 100% freshly-milled durum wheat semolina, brings a touch of gourmet quality to your kitchen. With a beautiful golden amber color and a classic nutty flavor, these noodles are perfect for enhancing a wide range of dishes.

Arrezzio Classi Cavatappi Scoobi Doo pasta features a spiral shape that is excellent for holding onto sauces, making it an ideal choice for baked pasta dishes, salads, and hearty casseroles. Its superior al-dente bite ensures a satisfying texture with every bite.

Key Features:

  • Premium Ingredients: Made from No. 1 grade 100% durum wheat semolina for exceptional quality.
  • Attractive Appearance: Golden amber color that adds visual appeal to your dishes.
  • Flavor and Texture: Classic nutty flavor and superior al-dente bite enhance the overall dining experience.
  • Versatile Use: Ideal for baked pasta dishes, salads, casseroles, and more.
  • Generous Packaging: Each case contains four 2.27KG (5 LBS) packages, suitable for both home and commercial kitchens.KG
  • Long Shelf-Life: 3-year shelf-life from the date of production when stored in a cool, dry area.

Arrezzio Classi Pasta Cavatappi Scoobi Doo is a must-have for any kitchen, providing versatility and gourmet quality to elevate your favorite recipes.

 
Packaging Information
• 4 x 2.27kg packaging in a corrugated master case

• Arrezzio dry pasta offers an average of 2.1 lbs cooked product to 1 lb of dry product. This is above average using ONLY 100% freshly-milled durum semolina. No flour added. • Recommended serving size for a foodservice operation is 6 ounces or 170 grams.

short_description: Have a hearty pasta dish on the table in minutes with Great Value Hearty & Wholesome Macaroni & Beef with Tomato Sauce. To heat the macaroni & beef in a 1000-watt microwave, lift the corner of the plastic film and then microwave on high for 10 minutes. Remove the film and stir, then continue cooking for 5 minutes. To prepare the frozen macaroni meal in a conventional oven, lift the corner of the film and preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Place the tray on a baking sheet and cook on the middle rack for 30 minutes. Remove the film and stir, then continue cooking for an additional 20 to 25 minutes. See full details on packaging. product_name: Barilla Spaghetti Pasta, Barilla Spaghetti 410g
short_description:
Spaghetti is the most popular pasta shape in Italy. The name comes from the Italian word spaghi, which means "lengths of cord." Spaghetti originates from the south of Italy and is commonly used with tomato sauces, fresh vegetables, or fish. BARILLA Spaghetti pasta is made with non-GMO ingredients.

At BARILLA, we're passionate about pasta. After all, we have been pasta makers since 1877. As an Italian family-owned food company, BARILLA pasta is synonymous with high quality and "al dente" perfection every time. Our spaghetti pasta is made from the finest durum wheat and is non-GMO verified, peanut-free and suitable for a vegan or vegetarian diet. Perfect for twirling in your favorite pasta sauce, too!

short_description: Urad flour, also known as black gram flour or urad dal flour, is a type of flour made from ground urad dal, which is a type of lentil commonly used in Indian cuisine. Urad dal is skinned black lentils or split black gram, which are rich in protein, dietary fiber, and various nutrients. Urad flour is often used as a key ingredient in Indian dishes such as dosa (a type of savory crepe), idli (steamed rice cakes), vada (fried lentil fritters), and various snacks and sweets. It adds a distinctive flavor and texture to dishes and is a popular ingredient in vegetarian and vegan cooking due to its nutritional benefits.

product_name: P.A.N. White Corn Meal - Pre-cooked Gluten Free and Kosher Flour for Arepas, 1 Kilogram (35 Ounces / 2 Pounds 3.3 Ounces) (Pack of 3)
short_description:
Delicious arepas can now be your specialty! Harina P.A.N. is one of the most popular brands of corn flour. Versatile and perfect for a wide range of
dishes such as arepas, empanadas, cornbread, bollos, hallacas, pupusas, tamales to mention just a few.

P.A.N. pre-cooked corn meal is a unique product made out of pure corn. Gluten-free and does not contain any preservatives, artificial colors or flavorings.
The production process is chemical free. Just by adding water, P.A.N. makes instant corn dough, creating a variety of delicious and easy corn based dishes
that can be adapted to different tastes and customs.

How to Prepare the Dough
Preparing the dough is an easy process:
- Pour 2 ½ cups of water into a container.
- Add salt and gradually mix in 2 ½ cups of corn meal.
- Briefly knead the mixture until a smooth dough is formed and then let it rest for 3 minutes.

How to Prepare Arepas
Separate dough in 10 pieces. Take one portion in your hands and shape it into a ball, then press it with your palms to form a large patty shape of about 10 cm
or 3 ½ inches in diameter. Place onto a griddle or frying pan over medium heat for 5 minutes on each side, or until brown on both sides, and serve hot.
Open the arepa and fill it with cheese, ham, eggs, salad or anything else you might put in a sandwich.

About us

The product was intended to bear a name that represented all that an arepa meant, which is that it was to be the "Venezuelan bread" or "pan" in Spanish.
It was thus that it came be called P.A.N., acronym for Productos Alimenticios Nacionales.

On December 10, 1960 P.A.N. was launched and achieved great success, from a complete satisfaction of the Venezuelan consumer.

Today, P.A.N. is found in more than 60 countries, bringing the delicious flavor of corn to consumers in an easy and practical way to prepare their favorite
corn based recipes.
  • THE MOST POPULAR WHITE CORN MEAL - Pre-cooked white corn meal P.A.N. from Empresas Polar is made with 100% selected White Corn which allows to obtain a soft dough ideal for the preparation of traditional Latin-American dishes. It has become one of the most popular and cherished brands of pre-cooked cornmeal
  • EASY TO PREPARE - Our white corn meal is pre-cooked, meaning your delicious meals will take less time to be ready! Just by adding water, P.A.N. makes instant corn dough, creating a variety of delicious corn based dishes. It can be cooked on a cast iron pan, grill, arepa maker, arepa toaster, griddle or oven. Cook it without oil for a fat free version! Keep in a clean, dry place
  • GET READY FOR CREATIVE AND TRADITIONAL MEALS - Perfect to prepare a substitute for bread in a latino brunch and main ingredient for Venezuelan, Colombian or Mexican recipes such as crisp arepas, arepas dulces (sweet arepas), cornbread, corn pancakes, empanadas, tortillas, polenta, galletas (corn cookies), hallacas venezolanas, milho frito, corn chips, and more!
  • KOSHER, HALAL, 100% GLUTEN FREE - Gluten Free, without preservatives, artificial colors or flavorings. Ingredients: pre-cooked white corn enriched with Vitamin D, Calcium, Iron, Potassium, Thiamin, Riboflavin, Niacin, Folate.

product_name: PAN White Corn Meal - Pre-Cooked Gluten Free and Kosher Flour for Arepas, 2.26kg/5lbs (4/CASE)
short_description:
Bring the authentic taste of Latin America to your kitchen with PAN White Corn Meal, Pre-Cooked Gluten-Free & Kosher Flour for Arepas, 2.26kg/5lbs! This premium pre-cooked white corn meal from P.A.N., a trusted brand since 1960, is made from 100% selected white corn, delivering a soft, versatile dough for traditional dishes like arepas, empanadas, cornbread, and tamales. Gluten-free, kosher, and free of preservatives, artificial colors, or flavors, this 2.26kg (5lb) bag is perfect for home cooks, restaurants, or catering. Available in single bags or a convenient 4-pack, it’s your go-to for creating delicious, authentic Latin meals with ease.
 
Key Features
  • 2.26kg/5lbs Capacity: Large bag yields multiple servings, ideal for bulk cooking or professional use.
  • 100% White Corn: Pre-cooked for a soft, pliable dough, perfect for arepas and more.
  • Gluten-Free & Kosher: Certified gluten-free and kosher (Star-K-Parve), suitable for diverse diets.
  • No Additives: Free of preservatives, artificial colors, or flavors for pure, natural taste.
  • Versatile Use: Ideal for arepas, empanadas, cornbread, tortillas, pupusas, and more.
  • Easy Preparation: Just add water to create instant corn dough for quick meals.
Why Choose This ItemThe PAN White Corn Meal is a must-have for its authentic flavor and versatility, making it the top choice for Latin American dishes. Its pre-cooked nature saves time, allowing you to whip up arepas or empanadas in minutes. Gluten-free and kosher, it’s perfect for those with dietary restrictions, and its chemical-free production ensures a clean, natural product. The 2.26kg size offers excellent value for families, restaurants, or catering, while the 4-pack option maximizes savings for bulk buyers. Customers praise its ease of use and authentic taste, bringing Venezuelan and Colombian traditions to life.
 
Preparation & Serving Details
  • Dough Preparation: Pour 5 cups of water into a container, add 1 tsp salt, and gradually mix in 4 cups of PAN corn meal. Knead briefly until smooth, then let rest for 3 minutes.
  • Arepas Instructions: Divide dough into 20 pieces. Shape each into a ball, then flatten into a 10cm (3.5-inch) patty. Cook on a griddle or frying pan over medium heat for 5 minutes per side until golden brown. Slice open and fill with cheese, ham, eggs, or your favorite fillings.
  • Serving Size: A 2.26kg bag yields about 75 servings (3 tbsp/30g each), perfect for large gatherings.

product_name: Rusingo Dosa Batter 900g
short_description: Prepare authentic South Indian dosas effortlessly with Rusingo Dosa Batter. This ready-to-use batter is crafted to give you the perfect blend of taste and texture, ensuring crisp, golden dosas every time. Made with natural ingredients and no added preservatives, Rusingo Dosa Batter brings the traditional flavor of homemade dosas to your kitchen, making it a convenient choice for busy households. No Added Preservatives: Enjoy the natural taste and goodness without any artificial additives. Convenient and Ready-to-Use: Saves you time and effort, allowing you to prepare dosas quickly and easily. Perfect Texture: Ensures crisp and golden dosas with a soft, fluffy interior every time. Cultural Significance: Dosas are a staple in South Indian cuisine, loved for their versatility and delightful taste. Whether enjoyed as a breakfast dish, a snack, or even dinner, dosas are cherished for their crisp texture and savory flavor. Rusingo Dosa Batter allows you to experience the authenticity of traditional dosas without the lengthy preparation process, making it a favorite choice for dosa enthusiasts. Cooking Tips: To make perfect dosas, heat a non-stick pan or a traditional cast-iron tava, and spread a ladleful of Rusingo Dosa Batter in a circular motion. Drizzle a little oil around the edges and cook until golden brown. Serve hot with chutney, sambar, or your favorite side dish. For a variation, try making uttapams by adding chopped vegetables to the batter before cooking. Why Choose Rusingo Dosa Batter? Rusingo Dosa Batter stands out for its commitment to quality and natural ingredients. With no added preservatives, you can enjoy the authentic taste of dosas just like homemade. This batter offers convenience without compromising on flavor, making it an excellent choice for anyone who loves South Indian cuisine but has a busy lifestyle. Bring the taste of South India to your home with Rusingo Dosa Batter and enjoy the delicious, crispy dosas that your family will love.

product_name: Verka Plain Gur, 1kg, Pack of 2

Perfect for sweetening beverages, cooking, or enjoying as a healthy snack, each jar comes with a handy handle for easy storage and use. Imported by Verka Food International Limited in Canada, this product is made in an SQF-certified facility, ensuring top-quality and safety standards.
