product_name: Rogers Sugar Granulated Fine 20 KG/44.09  LBS
short_description:
Discover the exceptional quality of Rogers Sugar Granulated Fine, the perfect choice for all your baking and sweetening needs. This finely granulated sugar is meticulously refined in Canada to ensure purity and consistency. With its fine texture and delicate sweetness, it's ideal for use in a wide range of recipes, including cakes, cookies, pastries, beverages, and more. Whether you're a professional baker or a home cook, this bulk pack of 44.09 pounds will keep you well-stocked for all your culinary creations.

Key Features:

  • Premium Quality: Meticulously refined white granulated sugar for superior taste and performance.
  • Fine Texture: Delivers a smooth and even sweetness to your recipes.
  • Versatile Use: Perfect for baking, cooking, sweetening beverages, and more.
  • Canadian Refined: Made with care in Canada for exceptional quality and purity.
  • Certified Kosher: Suitable for kosher diets and religious observances.
  • Vegetarian-Friendly: Ideal for vegetarian and vegan diets.
  • No Additives: Contains no artificial colors or flavors for a pure sweet taste

Packaging Information• 1 x 20kg Paper bag of White Granulated Sugar.
Size and Shape of Product
• Fine granulated sugar
Yield or Serving Size
• Serving Size 4 Grams, 15 Calories
Quality and Format
• Fine granulated white sugar contained loose in Paper Bag
• Ready to use
Storage and Usage• Store in a cool, dry location
Handling Instructions
• No special handling instructions.
Additional Product Information
• 55.25 x 34.29 x 12.7 cm bag
Marketing Statements
• Refined in Canada
• Certified Kosher
• Suitable for Vegetarian Diets
• No Artificial Colours or Flavours
Culinary Applications
• Sugar is versatile, can be used to bake, in hot or cold drinks, to cook and as a topping
Preparation and Cooking Instructions
• Best for baking cookies and breads. It makes dough more tender and gives bread a golden brown crust.

product_name: Bossen 4.4 lb. Brown / Black Sugar Crystal Boba
short_description: This Bossen brown / black sugar crystal boba offers an easy way to create trendy bubble teas or add tantalizing texture to your signature beverages or frozen yogurt! Also known as agar boba, this crystal boba is made from konjac, a plant native to eastern Asia, to create chewy, jelly-like pearls that are sweetened with a syrup flavored with brown / black sugar. Aside from using this product to create trendy bubble tea, you can also use these boba to add volume and value to other menu offerings like smoothies and shaved ice, or use them as a topping for frozen yogurt! They're a fun addition to any number of cold beverages and desserts. Unlike traditional tapioca boba pearls, these crystal boba don't require any cooking or preparation to reach their 10 mm diameter, making them easy to add to an assortment of recipes without extra work. Simply separate the crystal boba with a scoop before serving for best results. To maintain this product's freshness, it's recommended that you refrigerate after opening, store in an air-tight container, and consume within 2 weeks. In order to keep your establishment in good supply, this large 4.4 lb. bag contains approximately (20) 100g / 4 tbsp. servings of crystal boba! Since 2010, Bossen has specialized in creating premium boba products and fun Asian eats. They supply a diverse line of trendy offerings to satisfy the sweet tooth of any customer, from milk teas and Taiwanese-style snow ice to Bursting Boba pearls and frozen yogurt toppings! Explore Bossen's deliciously different products to find the perfect addition to your specialty drink menu.

  • Subtle Molasses Flavor: Adds a hint of richness to your dishes.
  • Versatile Usage: Ideal for glazes, butterscotch, cookies, pies, and more.

  • Large Package Size: 20 KG/44.09 LBS package is perfect for commercial use and high-volume applications

product_name: Sunbec - Portions - Raw Sugar - Brown - 3.5g - 1000 Pieces - Convenient Single-Serve Packets of Natural Brown Sugar (1000ct)
short_description:
This bulk pack of Sunbec Raw Brown Sugar Portions contains 1000 individual packets, each filled with 3.5g of natural brown sugar. These single-serve packets offer a convenient and mess-free way to sweeten your beverages, cereals, or desserts. Perfect for offices, cafes, restaurants, or anyone who enjoys the rich, caramel-like flavor of raw brown sugar.   

Key Features and Benefits:

Convenient Single-Serve Packets:

Individual packets eliminate the need for measuring and reduce spills.   

Ideal for on-the-go use or portion control.

Natural Brown Sugar:

Provides a rich, caramel-like flavor that enhances the taste of various foods and beverages.   

Retains more of the natural molasses, giving it a deeper flavor.

3.5g Portions:

Perfectly portioned for consistent sweetness in every serving.

Bulk Pack of 1000:

Provides a cost-effective solution for businesses or frequent users.

Sufficient quantity for high volume locations.

product_name: Swerve - Brown Sugar, 340g
short_description:
Make life a little sweeter with Swerve’s Brown Sugar! A natural sweetener without artificial ingredients. Just like sugar with zero calories! Sweet deal, right?

Key Information

  • Zero-calorie natural sweetener
  • Diabetes-safe
  • Measures, bakes, and cooks like sugar
  • Low glycemic index
  • Delicious flavour with no bitter aftertaste

Product Overview

Sweet tooth giving you grief? Make the switch to Swerve’s Brown Sugar! A delicious sweetener made from naturally sourced ingredients, it’s the perfect sugar alternative.

We know that sugar can wreak havoc on our bodies. Thankfully, Swerve’s Brown Sugar avoids a lot of those problems; it has little to no effect on blood glucose and insulin levels!

It’s derived from sweet, non-digestible carbohydrates found in certain starchy root vegetables and fruits.

With no artificial ingredients, flavourings, or preservatives and containing gut-friendly prebiotic fibre, it’s a fantastic choice for carb-conscious consumers.

When you hear it tastes just like sugar, bakes just like sugar, and even caramelizes just like sugar, you’ll realize that the sweetest dreams are made of Swerve!

Ingredients

Erythritol, Oligosaccharides, Vegetable Glycerin, Fruit Juice Concentrate (For Colour), and Natural Flavours.

Frequently Asked Questions

Oh no! My Swerve Brown Sugar has gone hard and clumpy. How do I fix this?

No need to worry, this happens sometimes! Swerve products can be a little sensitive to environmental factors like humidity and heat. It’s best to store it in a cool, dry place. If you’ve noticed that it is beginning to clump, popping it in the freezer can undo the effect the moisture has had on it.

Need it ready for action faster? You can pop it in a food processor and blitz or into the microwave for a few seconds (Swerve recommends 30 seconds).

The spice’s red colour makes it a bold garnish for deviled eggs and potato salad or mix with sea salt for a rimming salt for cocktails.

product_name: Napoleon's Celtic Salt - Celtic Salt Organic 82 Minerals Coarse, 1/2lb Resealable Bag, Naturally Moist, Hand Harvested, Unrefined from France, 100% Natural, 0.5lb French Grey
short_description: Embark on a culinary journey with Napoleon's Celtic Salt, where nature's rhythm and the salt worker's expertise converge. Twice a day, as the high tides embrace the marshes, the salt worker skillfully opens a valve, allowing the open sea's water to flow into the primary pond, 'vasière.' Guided by the sun, wind, and the artisan's mastery, the water gracefully evaporates, culminating in the crystallization ponds, 'oeillets.' Witness the enchanting metamorphosis as a simple drop of water transforms into a tiny grain of salt. With 84 trace minerals, your body will thank you. Elevate your culinary creations with this captivating process captured in every crystal of Napoloen's Coarse Grey Salt. While most companies will harvest and artificially dry their salt to less than 1% moisture. We naturally dry our salt in the sun to 10% moisture. This unique feature of our salt, allows all the minerals to remain in the salt to your benefit. Making the salt much more balanced than traditional sea salts. This product includes highlights of being 100% Organic, Certified Kosher, Gluten Free, Vegan, Paleo-Friendly. Product of France.

product_name: Pride of India- Himalayan White Salt Fine Grind 1 lbs (453.59 gm)- Rarest & Enriched W/84+ Natural Minerals- Low Sodium- Mineral Rich Nutrition and Enhanced Taste- Healthier Table Salt Substitute
short_description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of gastronomy with our Himalayan White Salt Fine Grind. Sourced meticulously from ancient salt deposits nestled deep within the pristine Himalayan ranges, this exquisite salt boasts a journey that spans millennia. Carefully selected and finely ground, each crystal encapsulates the untamed purity of nature, delivering a taste that is at once subtle and profound. With its delicate composition of trace minerals, including potassium, calcium, and magnesium, our Himalayan White Salt transcends ordinary seasoning to become an elemental masterpiece that enriches your culinary creations. Whether sprinkled over a freshly grilled steak to draw out its natural flavors, delicately incorporated into a vibrant salad dressing, or used as a finishing touch on gourmet dishes, the fine grind of this salt ensures a seamless blend that elevates every bite. Its distinct white hue and soft texture offer a feast for the eyes and palate alike, while its unaltered composition provides a health-conscious choice for the discerning epicurean. Allow the legacy of the ages to infuse your dishes as you embark on a sensory journey with our Himalayan White Salt Fine Grind—a testament to nature’s artistry and the embodiment of flavor in its purest form.

product_name: Eupherbia Blue Salt, Coarse, Rare Mineral Salt, High Potassium, Lower Sodium, 100g (3.5 oz)
short_description:
The Nutritious Blue Choice!
Blue salt, hand-harvested from ancient dried seas, is considered one of the rarest salts in the world. This mineral-rich alternative to table salt is high in potassium and lower in sodium. With a uniquely bold taste and a blueish-grey color, it is a popular choice to elevate dishes or to be used as a garnish.
Blue Salt is a superior option due to its lower sodium content and high potassium levels. With potassium comprising 20% of its mineral content, Blue Salt offers about 30% less sodium compared to other salts, making it a healthier alternative.
The captivating blue color of blue salt comes from potassium chloride naturally integrated into its crystals over millions of years. More than a seasoning, it's a piece of nature's craftsmanship, preserving the charm and benefits of an ancient era.
Tested using advanced FT-IR spectroscopy and microscopic examination by Certified Laboratories - USA, our ancient blue salt is free from microplastics and foreign matter. Enjoy the pure, exceptional quality of this rare natural wonder.

short_description: Pride of India incorporates naturally-grown food and herbal products from India into our daily life. These all-natural ingredients help enhance the overall health of the human body. Pride of India is family owned and operated, and we manufacture our products in the USA. Our Himalayan Pink Rock Salt is the purest form of salt available on planet Earth because it does not undergo any artificial treatment or refining processes. It is carved out from decades-old, naturally occurring salt reserves at the bed of the giant Himalayan mountains in the Indian subcontinent. The reddish-pink appearance of our pink salt proves its purity. This coarse salt contains up to 84 essential minerals that are quintessential for the human body in daily nutrition. The grainy texture, distinct flavor, and easy solubility of our pink salt make it great for kitchen use as well as in the bath. Pink Himalayan salt contains sodium and other electrolytes that can help balance electrolytes, regulate hydration, balance PH levels. Commercial table salt contains between 97.5% and 99.9% sodium chloride, while Himalayan sea salt only contains about 87%. Additionally, many table salts go through a bleaching process and may even contain harmful ingredients. Our Himalayan salt, however, is natural and doesn’t go through a refining process. Pink salt can be used in salt lamps, as a salt substitute, in bath scrubs, or as a bath salt. It’s also a superior substitute for table salt. Use a pinch in your favorite recipe

product_name: Pride Of India - Himalayan Rock Salt - 84+ Natural Mineral Enriched (Pure Himalayan Pink Salt, Coarse Grind 5 Pound Jar)
short_description: Pride of India incorporates naturally-grown food and herbal products from India into our daily life. These all-natural ingredients help enhance the overall health of the human body. Pride of India is family owned and operated, and we manufacture our products in the USA. Our Himalayan Pink Rock Salt is the purest form of salt available on planet Earth because it does not undergo any artificial treatment or refining processes. It is carved out from decades-old, naturally occurring salt reserves at the bed of the giant Himalayan mountains in the Indian subcontinent. The reddish-pink appearance of our pink salt proves its purity. This coarse salt contains up to 84 essential minerals that are quintessential for the human body in daily nutrition. The grainy texture, distinct flavor, and easy solubility of our pink salt make it great for kitchen use as well as in the bath. Pink Himalayan salt contains sodium and other electrolytes that can help balance electrolytes, regulate hydration, balance PH levels, . Commercial table salt contains between 97.5% and 99.9% sodium chloride, while Himalayan sea salt only contains about 87%. Additionally, many table salts go through a bleaching process and may even contain harmful ingredients. Our Himalayan salt, however, is natural and doesn’t go through a refining process. Pink salt can be used in salt lamps, as a salt substitute, in bath scrubs, or as a bath salt. It’s also a superior substitute for table salt. Use a pinch in your favorite recipe!

product_name: Club House, Quality Natural Herbs & Spices, Smoked Paprika, 116g, 116 g
short_description: Club House® Smoked Paprika is made from smoking and drying sweet peppers for a paprika with distinctive flavour. It adds delicious depth to Spanish dishes, like paella, as well as meats, potatoes, sauces and stews. Our Smoked Paprika blends full flavour and rich colour with a hint of smoke. Sprinkle on scrambled eggs or tomato soup, or rub onto chicken, fish or pork. It adds smoky intensity to seasoning rubs for heartier cuts of meat for roasting or grilling. Get creative and add this irresistible smoky-sweet taste to chili, sweet potatoes, beans, roasted vegetables and meatless dishes. The spice’s red colour makes it a bold garnish for deviled eggs and potato salad or mix with sea salt for a rimming salt for cocktails.

short_description: Description  Automatic Operation:Our pepper grinder adopts advanced gravity sensing design, No need manual grinding, no buttons to press,great for customers suffering of Chronic Hand Pain. product_name: ZWILLING Enfinigy Electric Salt And Pepper Mill, White
short_description:
The perfect mill for a perfect meal. Available in black or white the ZWILLING ENFINIGY Spice Mill efficiently grinds salt, pepper and other spices at the touch of a button. It’s no wonder, considering that the salt mill houses a high-quality ceramic grinder, made by ZWILLING. The ceramic is particularly hard, non-wearing and grinds spices to fully release their flavours. You decide how coarse or fine you want spices, by setting the grind size as you wish. Providing the necessary power is the salt mill's high-performance motor. This is powered by a rechargeable Li-ion battery. Thanks to its large charge it only needs to be plugged in again after frequent grinding. And because there are no batteries to change, you save money and protect the environment.

Providing excellent usability are the window that goes all the way around, so you can always see how full the pepper mill is and when it needs refilling, as well as the built-in LED light that turns on when the salt and pepper grinder are in use to provide clear illumination in dark working environment and deep pots. The electric salt and pepper mill also has an incredibly attractive style making it pair perfectly with dinner parties. Like all the products of the ZWILLING ENFINIGY series, it is designed by the Milan-based designers Matteo Thun & Antonio Rodriguez and impresses with its timeless, minimalist design.

1 Piece

  • Rechargeable Li-ion battery with large charge capacity and USB-C port
  • Wear-free ceramic grinder for fully releasing spice aromas
  • Powerful motor
  • Adjustable grind size, from coarse to fine
  • Circumferential window and LED light when grinding
  • Minimalist design by Milan-based Matteo Thun & Antonio Rodriguez
  • Built-in LED light

product_name: Cole & Mason London Refillable Salt and Pepper Mills Set, Red Gloss, 7" - Ceramic Mechanism for Salt, Carbon Steel Mechanism for Pepper
short_description: The Cole & Mason Salt Mill features an ultra-sharp ceramic mechanism that stays rust-free over time. It's designed to hold your preferred coarse salt, offering precise seasoning with every use. The matching Pepper Mill is equipped with a Precision+ carbon steel mechanism, which strips peppercorns rather than crushing them, bringing out their full flavor. To maintain the mills, simply wipe them clean with a damp cloth and dry them with a clean one—avoid immersing them in water or using a dishwasher. Both mills come with a lifetime mechanism guarantee, ensuring long-lasting reliability in your kitchen. Cole & Mason remains dedicated to enhancing the seasoning experience at the heart of every meal.

product_name: Cole & Mason Salt & Pepper Mill Gift Set, London Collection, White Gloss, 18 cm, Ceramic Salt Mill, Carbon Steel Pepper Mill
short_description: This Cole & Mason Salt and Pepper Mill Gift Set from the London Collection features a white gloss finish. The salt mill has a ceramic grinding mechanism, while the pepper mill uses a carbon steel grinder. Both mills are 18 cm (7") tall, easy to adjust, and built for lasting performance. Perfect for fresh, flavorful seasoning at every meal.

product_name: Club House, Quality Natural Herbs & Spices, Smoked Paprika, 116g, 116 g
short_description: Club House® Smoked Paprika is made from smoking and drying sweet peppers for a paprika with distinctive flavour. It adds delicious depth to Spanish dishes, like paella, as well as meats, potatoes, sauces and stews. Our Smoked Paprika blends full flavour and rich colour with a hint of smoke. Sprinkle on scrambled eggs or tomato soup, or rub onto chicken, fish or pork. It adds smoky intensity to seasoning rubs for heartier cuts of meat for roasting or grilling. Get creative and add this irresistible smoky-sweet taste to chili, sweet potatoes, beans, roasted vegetables and meatless dishes. The spice’s red colour makes it a bold garnish for deviled eggs and potato salad or mix with sea salt for a rimming salt for cocktails.

product_name: Club House, Quality Natural Herbs & Spices, Smoked Paprika, 116g, 116 g
short_description: Club House® Smoked Paprika is made from smoking and drying sweet peppers for a paprika with distinctive flavour. It adds delicious depth to Spanish dishes, like paella, as well as meats, potatoes, sauces and stews. Our Smoked Paprika blends full flavour and rich colour with a hint of smoke. Sprinkle on scrambled eggs or tomato soup, or rub onto chicken, fish or pork. It adds smoky intensity to seasoning rubs for heartier cuts of meat for roasting or grilling. Get creative and add this irresistible smoky-sweet taste to chili, sweet potatoes, beans, roasted vegetables and meatless dishes. The spice’s red colour makes it a bold garnish for deviled eggs and potato salad or mix with sea salt for a rimming salt for cocktails.

product_name: Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 500 mL
short_description: Enhance your favourite dishes and dressings with the exquisite flavour of Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil. This olive oil from Spain lends savoury depth and silky texture to marinades, bread and vegetable dips, and roasted foods. It's ideal for sautéing meats, drizzling over soup, dressing cooked pasta, and garnishing pizza. A versatile cooking oil, it’s essential in a variety of baking recipes and a convenient substitute for butter. Stored at room temperature in a cool, dry place, this extra virgin olive oil has countless everyday uses in any well-stocked kitchen.

product_name: Terra Delyssa Squeezable Extra Virgin Olive Oil,750 ml, Terra Delyssa Squeez Olive Oil
short_description: Terra Delyssa Extra Virgin Olive Oil in a convenient squeezable bottle is your new essential for everyday cooking. This chef-inspired packaging makes using premium extra virgin olive oil easier than ever. Sourced from our own Tunisian orchards, it is crafted through a first cold press, resulting in a smooth and fresh flavour that elevates all your culinary creations.  The user-friendly squeeze bottle provides total control, perfect for drizzling over salads, grilling, sautéing vegetables, or serving as a flavourful dipping oil for bread.  At Terra Delyssa, quality is our promise. We oversee every stage of production, from the olive tree to the sealed bottle, guaranteeing that our olives are harvested and cold-pressed within 24 hours to capture the freshest possible taste. Each batch undergoes rigorous testing in our advanced laboratory to ensure it meets the most stringent quality standards.  Recognized at the world’s best international olive oil competitions—including the Canada International Olive Oil Competition, where Terra Delyssa earned a prestigious Gold Quality Award—our extra virgin olive oil continues to win praise for its excellence.  With multiple gold awards, Terra Delyssa brings you a single-origin extra virgin olive oil with a mild, smooth flavour profile ideal for enhancing your everyday meals. Experience the same exceptional quality with the added convenience of our squeezable bottle, designed for effortless and precise drizzling every time.  Choose Terra Delyssa Extra Virgin Olive Oil for award-winning quality, smooth flavour, and ease in your kitchen.

product_name: Gallo Extra Virgin Olive Oil 1L, 1 L
short_description: A robust flavour with a distinct aroma and taste.  Gallo Extra Virgin Olive oil is perfect in salads, dressing vegetables, and other cooking applications.

product_name: Saporito Foods Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Extra Virgin Olive Oil
short_description: This oil is a premium quality, first cold pressed olive oil imported from Italy. In addition to its numerous health benefits, this oil has a great flavour profile and is superb for salad dressings, marinades and light pan frying.

product_name: Terra Delyssa Huile d'Olive Extra Vierge Premium, Première Presse à Froid, Lauréate, 500ml, TERRA DELYSSA PREMIUM EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OIL
short_description: Terra Delyssa Extra virgin olive oil, made from 100% Tunisian olives, is crafted from the first cold press of hand-picked, pesticide-free olives, providing premium quality with less than 0.4% acidity, and is bottled in dark glass to preserve its natural polyphenols and antioxidants. product_name: CAPRI Pure Vegetable Oil 4L - Your All-Purpose Hero for Healthy, Delicious Cooking!
short_description:
Hello, home chefs and culinary enthusiasts! Have you been on a quest for a kitchen staple that’s as versatile as it is reliable? Well, let's raise a toast (with bread you've fried up yourself, of course) to our ever-dependable Vegetable Oil!

Now, this isn't just some ordinary oil. This is the Swiss Army knife of your kitchen, ready to step up to the plate (or pan) whether you're sautéing, frying, baking, or grilling. With this vegetable oil, you've got a ticket to Crispy Town for your fried chicken, a passport to Flavor Country for your sautéed veggies, and the secret ingredient to a moist and delicious cake.

But wait, you're thinking, "Isn't oil, well...oily?" Yes and no. While our vegetable oil does bring the heat, it does so in a way that enhances your food, rather than overpowering it. It's a smooth operator, providing the perfect medium for cooking without stealing the spotlight from your culinary creations.

Our vegetable oil also doesn't discriminate when it comes to heat. Whether you're slow-cooking at a low temperature or cranking up the heat for a quick fry, this oil remains stable, reducing the risk of smoke or burning. It's like the reliable best friend of your kitchen - always there when you need it, and always ready to help your dishes shine.

And let's talk about quantity, because our vegetable oil comes in a generously-sized container that's perfect for those who cook up a storm on the regular. No need to run to the store every time you want to whip up a batch of fries or a pan of stir-fry. With our vegetable oil, you've got plenty to go around.

So whether you're a home cook looking for a versatile kitchen staple, a restaurant owner stocking up on essentials, or a baker in search of the perfect ingredient for a moist cake, our vegetable oil is here to save the day.

short_description:
Unlock endless possibilities with Gordon Choice Pure White Vinegar, 5L! This pure, 5% acetic acid vinegar is a kitchen and household staple, offering a tangy flavor for cooking and powerful cleaning properties. Made from simple ingredients, it's perfect for enhancing salad dressings, marinades, sauces, or pickling veggies. Beyond the kitchen, it tackles tough cleaning tasks like unclogging sinks, disinfecting surfaces, and shining chrome. With its generous 5-liter size, it's ideal for families, restaurants, or anyone who appreciates dependable value in a versatile product.
 
Key Features
  • 5L Capacity: Large jug for bulk use, yielding hundreds of servings or cleaning applications.
  • 5% Acetic Acid: Provides the perfect balance for tangy flavor and effective cleaning power.
  • Natural & Pure: Free from additives, making it a clean choice for food and home use.
  • Versatile Applications: Great for cooking, pickling, cleaning, and disinfecting.
  • Eco-Friendly: A natural alternative to chemical cleaners, safe for wooden surfaces and stainless steel.

Why Choose This ItemThe Gordon Pure White Vinegar is a go-to for its reliability and multi-purpose benefits, combining culinary enhancement with household cleaning in one bottle. Its 5% acetic acid strength delivers tangy flavor to dressings and marinades while effectively disinfecting and shining surfaces without harsh chemicals. Customers love its natural purity and versatility, making it a staple for eco-conscious homes, busy kitchens, or professional settings. Plus, it's a budget-friendly way to handle everything from pickling to unclogging sinks.
 
Preparation & Serving Details
  • Culinary Preparation: Mix with oil, herbs, and spices for salad dressings; use in marinades for meats or veggies; add to sauces for tang.
  • Cleaning Instructions: Combine with baking soda and hot water to unclog sinks; spray on chrome or stainless steel for a streak-free shine; disinfect cutting boards by soaking in vinegar.
  • Serving Size: Use 1–2 tbsp per serving for dressings or marinades; for cleaning, dilute as needed (e.g., 1:1 with water for sprays). A 5L jug provides hundreds of uses.
  • Storage: Store at room temperature in a cool, dry place. Keep tightly capped to maintain potency.

product_name: Lee Kum Kee 5 Gallon Premium Soy Sauce
short_description: Add deeply rich, classic Asian flavor to a wide variety of dishes with this Lee Kum Kee premium soy sauce! Made from premium soybeans and freshly-milled wheat flour, this soy sauce is brewed using traditional methods in order to create a dark reddish-brown color and a deeply umami, salty flavor. Packaged in a bulk 5 gallon container, this premium soy sauce is a perfect way to ensure that your Asian restaurant remains well-stocked with the essentials. Plus, this product is made with non-GMO soybeans and contains no artificial colorings or preservatives, making it a natural choice for your establishment. Soy sauce is one of the world's oldest condiments and it has a long history of adding delicious flavor to a wide variety of Asian dishes! It brings deeply savory, salty taste to classic Asian dishes and fusion dishes alike. Use this soy sauce in your kitchen to flavor stir frys, noodle dishes, Japanese shoyu ramen, and a whole host of other delicious entrees. It's also a great addition to marinades for meats, fish, vegan proteins like tofu and tempeh, or vegetables. Try blending it with oil and spices like garlic, ginger, and chili to make delicious dressings to add to finished dishes! This premium soy sauce can also be used to refill tabletop containers for your patrons to use as a condiment for their meals. It makes a perfect dip for practically any variety of sushi, as well as for meats and bite-sized appetizers. Invite your patrons to drizzle this soy sauce over noodle dishes, stir frys, or fried rice to allow them to adjust the flavor to their liking.  While running a humble tea and oyster soup shop in Guangdong, China, Lee Kum Sheung had a happy accident; one day in 1888, he simmered his oysters for too long. His normally clear oyster soup had turned into a thick brown sauce with a rich aroma and an astonishingly complex flavor. Lee knew he had accidentally made something wonderful! He created the Lee Kum Kee brand to promote his newly-invented oyster sauce, and as the sauce's popularity began to grow, so did his company. Though today, Lee Kum Kee is an international brand that is well-known throughout China and around the world, this family-owned business has remained rooted in its beginnings as a simple company founded on delicious flavor. Lee Kum Kee offers a wide variety of traditional Chinese sauces and condiments and is constantly creating innovative new flavors that set the standard for great taste. Whether you're looking for authentic Chinese flavor or delicious condiments to help you keep up with industry trends, Lee Kum Kee offers something for every establishment.

product_name: Lee Kum Kee Gluten-Free Soy Sauce, 1.89L (½ Gallon) – Naturally Brewed, Non-GMO, Wheat-Free Soy Sauce for Cooking & Marinades
short_description:
With this Lee Kum Kee gluten-free soy sauce, your patrons can enjoy the classic Asian flavor they know and love - but without the gluten! This naturally-brewed soy sauce is made according to a traditional recipe with whole soybeans to offer a deep reddish-brown color and a rich, umami flavor. Unlike many commercially-available varieties of soy sauce, this product is brewed without wheat, making it naturally gluten-free. Packaged in a bulk 1/2 gallon bottle with a convenient handle, this gluten-free soy sauce is a perfect way to ensure that your Asian restaurant remains well-stocked with the essentials. Your patrons with celiac disease, gluten allergies, and gluten sensitivities will appreciate having this gluten-free version available for use. Plus, this product is made with non-GMO soybeans and contains no artificial flavorings, colorings, or preservatives, making it a natural choice for your establishment.

Soy sauce is one of the world's oldest condiments and it has a long history of adding delicious flavor to a wide variety of Asian dishes! It brings deeply savory, salty taste to classic Asian dishes and fusion dishes alike. Use this soy sauce in your kitchen to flavor stir frys, noodle dishes, Japanese shoyu ramen, and a whole host of other delicious entrees. It's also a great addition to marinades for meats, fish, vegan proteins like tofu and tempeh, or vegetables. Try blending it with oil and spices like garlic, ginger, and chili to make delicious dressings to add to finished dishes! This gluten-free soy sauce can also be used to refill tabletop containers for your patrons to use as a condiment for their meals. It makes a perfect dip for practically any variety of sushi, as well as for meats and bite-sized appetizers. Invite your patrons to drizzle this soy sauce over noodle dishes, stir frys, or fried rice to allow them to adjust the flavor to their liking.

short_description: With this Lee Kum Kee gluten-free soy sauce, your patrons can enjoy the classic Asian flavor they know and love - but without the gluten! This naturally-brewed soy sauce is made according to a traditional recipe with whole soybeans to offer a deep reddish-brown color and a rich, umami flavor. Unlike many commercially-available varieties of soy sauce, this product is brewed without wheat, making it naturally gluten-free. Packaged in a convenient 5.1 oz. bottle with flip-top a pour spout, this gluten-free soy sauce is perfect for tabletop use. Your patrons with celiac disease, gluten allergies, and gluten sensitivities will appreciate having this gluten-free version available for use. Plus, this product is made with non-GMO soybeans and contains no artificial flavorings, colorings, or preservatives, making it a natural choice for your establishment. Soy sauce is one of the world's oldest condiments and it has a long history of adding delicious flavor to a wide variety of Asian dishes! It makes a perfect dip for practically any variety of sushi, as well as for meats and bite-sized appetizers. It brings deeply savory, salty flavor to classic Asian dishes and fusion dishes alike. Invite your patrons to drizzle this soy sauce over noodle dishes, stir frys, or fried rice to allow them to adjust the flavor to their liking.  While running a humble tea and oyster soup shop in Guangdong, China, Lee Kum Sheung had a happy accident; one day in 1888, he simmered his oysters for too long. His normally clear oyster soup had turned into a thick brown sauce with a rich aroma and an astonishingly complex flavor. Lee knew he had accidentally made something wonderful! He created the Lee Kum Kee brand to promote his newly-invented oyster sauce, and as the sauce's popularity began to grow, so did his company. Though today, Lee Kum Kee is an international brand that is well-known throughout China and around the world, this family-owned business has remained rooted in its beginnings as a simple company founded on delicious flavor. Lee Kum Kee offers a wide variety of traditional Chinese sauces and condiments and is constantly creating innovative new flavors that set the standard for great taste. Whether you're looking for authentic Chinese flavor or delicious condiments to help you keep up with industry trends, Lee Kum Kee offers something for every establishment.

product_name: Maille Dijon Originale Mustard, Bulk Food Service Jar 3.78L / 4.18kg – Classic French Mustard
short_description:
Bring classic French flavour to every station with Maille Dijon Originale Mustard (3.78L)—a smooth, creamy premium French Dijon mustard trusted by chefs since 1747. The bulk Dijon mustard for foodservice format delivers consistent tang and gentle warmth that blends cleanly into dressings, marinades, glazes, sauces, dips, and sandwich spreads.

Crafted from simple ingredients—water, mustard seeds, vinegar, salt, citric acid, sodium metabisulfite (to protect quality)—it offers a balanced profile that complements meats, fish, vegetables, and grains without overpowering them.

This restaurant-size Dijon mustard is gluten-free, contains no artificial colors or flavors, and is kosher certified in foodservice listings, making it a reliable back-of-house staple. Whether you’re prepping for backyard BBQs and patio parties, camp kitchens, or high-volume service, the 3.78 L jar provides efficiency and value without compromising Maille’s signature texture and finish.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Bulk value (3.78 L): Designed for restaurants, catering, and high-volume prep.

  • Authentic Dijon heritage: Maille’s traditional recipe and silky finish since 1747.

  • Clean, versatile profile: Tangy, gently warming; emulsifies beautifully in vinaigrettes and sauces.

  • Dietary friendly: Gluten-free, no artificial colors or flavors, kosher.

  • Simple ingredient deck: Water, mustard seeds, vinegar, salt, citric acid, sodium metabisulfite.

Use Cases & Applications

  • Vinaigrettes & cold prep: Greens, grain bowls, potato salad, slaws.

  • Hot line & sauces: Pan sauces for chicken, pork, mustard cream, deglazes.

  • Marinades & glazes: Salmon, sausages, ribs, roasted vegetables.

product_name: Hellmann's Real Mayonnaise, 890 mL Mayonnaise
short_description: Hellmann's Real Mayonnaise is proudly made with real, simple, high-quality ingredients like Canadian free-run eggs, and canola oil. We know that to really "Bring Out The Best," we need to do more than just taste great. That’s why our delicious Blue Ribbon Quality Mayonnaise is made with simple, quality ingredients, like Canadian eggs, and canola oil from the Prairies. Even after 100 years, we’re still committed to using premium ingredients to craft the highest quality mayonnaise. It's simple. We use our finest, real ingredients in Hellmann's Real. Our mayonnaise is a source of Omega-3 and is also gluten-free and certified kosher. Enjoy the delicious creamy taste of Hellmann's Real Mayonnaise as a spread, or in a recipe, to elevate your favourite foods. It’s the ideal condiment for spreading on sandwiches and wraps, grilling juicy burgers, mixing creamy dips, and preparing fresh salads. Use it to make outrageously delicious meals like our Parmesan Crusted Chicken. Discover our mayonnaise recipes, products, information about our sourcing, and more on our website, Hellmanns.ca.

product_name: Kewpie Mayonnaise 1 Gallon | Authentic & Creamy | 4/Case Bulk Food Service
short_description: Expand your sushi and seafood menu with this 1 gallon kewpie mayonnaise! Ahighly popular condiment in Japan, kewpie mayo boasts smooth, creamy textureperfect for serving up with your signature appetizers and sushi rolls. Thisrecipe is made with rice vinegar rather than distilled vinegar and egg yolksrather than whole eggs for unique, rich flavor and perfect consistency.Slightly-sweet in flavor, it's great for use in dressings, dipping sauces, andspreads.    A perfect balance of sweet and acidic, this kewpie mayo is made with soybeanoil, egg yolk, water, rice vinegar, salt, sugar, and lemon juice. Use thiskewpie mayo as a topping for fried fish sandwiches with onion, lettuce, andtomato, or as a dressing for your signature seafood salad with calamari! Tryit as a simple dipping sauce for sushi rolls, breaded clams, or your othermouthwatering appetizers. Alternatively, impress your guests with a freshsushi bowl of white rice, sesame seed oil, kewpie mayo, chopped salmon, greenonion, cucumber, and a drizzle of sriracha! No matter what application youchoose, your guests won't be able to get enough of this kewpie mayonnaise.

product_name: Kewpie Japanese Mayonnaise - Authentic Flavor | 1Kg/2.2Lbs
short_description:
Kewpie is a renowned brand known for producing some of the best mayonnaise globally. Its signature product, Japanese mayonnaise, is incredibly versatile and boasts a unique flavor that enhances a wide variety of dishes. Kewpie Mayonnaise is characterized by its smooth and creamy texture, slightly sweet taste, and a subtle umami flavor that sets it apart from traditional mayonnaise.

This mayonnaise is made using only high-quality ingredients, including vegetable oil, vinegar, egg yolk, and a touch of MSG for that distinct umami kick. It's fantastic in sushi rolls, sandwiches, salads, or even as a dipping sauce for your favorite snacks.

In this offer, you'll receive a large 1kg bottle, ensuring you have enough Kewpie Mayonnaise to experiment with and enjoy in many different dishes. It's packaged in a soft squeeze bottle with a narrow tip to facilitate easy use, control serving sizes, and minimize waste.

Whether you're a professional chef or a home cook, Kewpie Mayonnaise is a must-have ingredient that will elevate your culinary creations to a new level. With Kewpie in your kitchen, the possibilities are endless!

short_description: For a great tasting alternative to traditional mayonnaise made from 100% plant-based ingredients, Hellmann's Vegan Dressing & Spread is all you need to turn what looks like an everyday meal into an epic vegan dish. Turn nothing into something, with just a bit of creativity and a dollop of our sauce. Hellmann's vegan mayonnaise type dressing can help you transform your meals into something truly delicious, and with this 4-pack you'll have more deliciousness to spread. Enjoy the unmistakably amazing taste of Hellmann's Vegan Dressing, knowing that it's packed with quality ingredients in a certified vegan recipe with no compromise on taste or texture. Free from trans fat and low in saturated fat, as well as being gluten-free and a good source of omega-3 polyunsaturates, this vegan mayo type dressing is the perfect condiment for vegan burgers, fries and sandwiches that you can feel good about serving to your friends and family. We've removed the eggs, but not the original taste you love about our spread. Did you notice the slightly darker tint of our bottles? That's because they are now made from 100% recycled plastics and are recyclable. Our better plastics practices can save approximately 14 million plastic bottles from being used every year. There is no denying that food waste is a huge problem. Our goal is to show that ingredients commonly left-behind in the back of your fridge can be transformed into something new. With Hellmann's, you can create exciting dishes with real taste for less waste. #maketastenotwaste

Discover the lighter side of mayonnaise with Hellmann's Light 1/2 Fat Mayonnaise, crafted to satisfy your cravings with fewer calories and less fat. With 50% less fat and 50% fewer calories than Hellmann's Real Mayonnaise, our gluten-free dressing is a healthier alternative without compromising on taste. product_name: Heinz 1.5 Gallon Mayonnaise Dispenser Pouch with Fitment - 2/Case
short_description: Use this Heinz mayonnaise to bring just the right amount of creamy, tangyflavor to your signature foods. Featuring a balanced taste and creamy,spreadable texture, this mayonnaise offers a convenient, versatile addition toyour high-volume operation. Spread onto sandwiches, use as an ingredient inyour egg, chicken, and tuna salads, or substitute for butter on your grilledcheese to achieve a crispy, golden crust. It's also great for mixing withother ingredients like ketchup, sriracha, herbs, and seasonings to creaturesignature sandwich spreads or dipping sauces for vegetable platters.    Best of all, this mayonnaise comes ready to use in a compatible pump dispenser(sold separately) and each bag features a connecting tube for easyinstallation. Keep it in the kitchen to use as an ingredient or place in thefront-of-the-house for customers to use as they please. Not only will thisdispenser pouch help ensure convenient, mess-free application and reduceproduct waste, it can also offer hands-free condiment dispensing for yourpatrons to increase the safety and sanitation of your establishment.    The Heinz company started in 1869, when H.J. Heinz began selling bottledsauces, pickles, horseradish, and vinegar. As their products gainedpopularity, Heinz rapidly expanded its portfolio to introduce products likeits world-famous ketchup and steak sauce. Heinz takes great care in producinghigh quality ingredients, including using their own proprietary blend of Heinztomato seeds to make their delicious ketchup. Heinz products have been a partof America's mealtimes as a savory topping, tangy dipping sauce, or recipeingredient and has been a trusted name among consumers for generations.Bringing you reliable performance with unrivaled taste, Heinz products aresure to become pantry staples in your establishment!

product_name: Great Value Smooth Peanut Butter, 1 kg
short_description:
For a classic treat you can enjoy any time, reach for Great Value Smooth Peanut Butter. Prepared using dry roasted peanuts, this smooth peanut butter delivers that nutty flavour you know and love with a creamy texture that's easy to spread and serves up a delectable finish. Plus, it contains no synthetic or artificial colours, flavours or sweeteners and has only 90 calories and 1 gram of sugar per serving to act as a more mindful snack option. You can enjoy this creamy peanut butter on its own or as a dip or spread with toast, crackers, fruit and more. You can even use it as a base for sauces and marinades or a filling in baked goods and sweet treats to add an unexpected twist.

short_description:
Dive into the delightful world of Torani Peanut Butter Flavoring Syrup, where the rich and creamy taste of peanut butter meets pure cane sugar for an irresistible flavor experience. Perfect for enhancing beverages and desserts alike, this syrup is a must-have for coffee shops, cafes, and restaurants!

Key Features:

  • Irresistible Peanut Butter Flavor: Experience the authentic taste of creamy peanut butter, adding a nostalgic twist to your drinks and desserts.
  • Made with Pure Cane Sugar: Crafted from high-quality ingredients to deliver a naturally sweet flavor without any artificial additives.
  • Syrup Pump Compatibility: Easily measure and dispense the perfect amount with a .25 oz. syrup pump (sold separately), ensuring no mess.
  • Versatile Usage: Ideal for flavoring coffee, enhancing baked goods, or creating delectable desserts—let your creativity shine!
  • Attractive Easy-Pour Bottle: The elegant glass design not only looks great on your shelves but also allows for smooth pouring.
  • Generous Servings: Each bottle provides 25 1 oz. servings, making it a cost-effective addition to your menu.cost

Benefits:

product_name: Organic Chyavanprash Jam/ Herbal Jam
short_description: Chyavanprash has an interesting story behind its name: “Chyavanprash is linked to the story of the Rishi Chyvana and the events surrounding his tale. Chyvana devoted a large part of his time to pursuing enlightenment, which eventually attracted the attention of the Devas or Gods. Through their fear of Chyvana’s devotion and the high chance of him being admitted to the Heavenly realms – which they really didn’t want - they attempted to put a stop to his actions by summoning the beautiful nymph Menakā. Menakā quickly sought out Chywana and this is where the story of Chyavanprash really begins. Menakā worked hard to prevent Chyvana from deep meditation, offering beautiful flowers and delicious foods as distractions. After months of this, Chyvana slowly turned his attentions to Menakā’s beauty and kindness, and away from his original goal of enlightenment. It wasn’t long before Chyvana and Menakā were together, though this wasn’t without its problems. Not only was Menakā a lot younger than Chyvana but she was also immortal, which doesn’t make for a great pairing. Chyvana quickly abandoned his practices and set out into the forest to find a way to solve their problem. After preparing an elixir to reverse his aging, Chyvana returned completely rejuvenated. Rather than remaining as an elderly man, he had a much more youthful appearance and a new lease of life. Thanks to this mysterious elixir that we now know to be Chyavanprash, Chyvana and Menakā remained together and went on to, as they say, live happily ever after.”

product_name: Dalmatia 3.3 lb. Sour Cherry Spread

product_name: Campbell's Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup 1.36 L/48oz (12 pack)
short_description:
Serve up delicious soup or create classic comfort foods with this Campbell's 50 oz. can of cream of mushroom condensed soup. Featuring a smooth consistency, this soup is made with real cream, earthy mushrooms, and robust garlic for a rich and hearty taste. Its familiar flavor will be a popular addition to the menu of your school, health care facility, restaurant, hotel, or diner! Best of all, this wholesome soup is low in calories per serving, making it a healthy menu item you can feel great about serving. Featuring the classic Campbell's flavor your guests know and trust, this soup is proof that nothing beats the original.

Thanks to its condensed formula and simple preparation, this soup will help to cut down on prep time and labor costs in your kitchen, making it easy for you to get delicious soup to your hungry customers faster. To prepare, simply combine one can of soup with one can of water in a 4 quart pot. Simmer and whisk over low heat until warmed through, then serve! For a creamier end result, combine half portions of milk and water. Once it's heated, simply ladle out portions of soup into a bowl or cup. Pair it with a pack of crackers, garnish it with crunchy croutons, or serve it with a freshly-baked roll or crisp side salad. Keep things simple by offering it a la carte or with half of a sandwich for the perfect lunch combination. Cream of mushroom is also an essential base for a variety of classic comfort foods. Use it to create green bean casserole topped with crispy onions, hearty beef stroganoff, creamy Swedish meatballs, or rich scalloped potatoes. It makes a great addition to casseroles of all kinds, stews, and even gravy!

For more than 150 years, Campbell's has been a trusted name in American households. With humble roots as a wholesale produce distributor, Campbell's made a name for itself when company president John T. Dorrance invented the process of condensing soup, allowing shelf-stable soup to be sold in cans all over the country. Campbell's groundbreaking canned soup drew international attention and earned the company a bronze medal at the 1900 Paris Exposition. This medallion still appears on cans of Campbell's soup to this day! Over the decades, Campbell's has developed new products and acquired new brands, but has remained true to their original mission to bring their customers wholesome, nutritious food that enriches lives. Perhaps that's what has helped Campbell's remain a household name, pop art icon, and trusted brand for more than a century. Browse Campbell's extensive line of foodservice offerings to find delicious solutions for your establishment that carry the Campbell's name your customers know.

• For Cream of Tomato, in a 4 quart pot combine one can of soup with one can of milk. Simmer over low heat, stirring often

product_name: Pack of 6 - Campbell's Condensed Tomato Soup, 284 mL, 4 Count

product_name: Campbell's® Condensed Low Fat Cream of Mushroom Soup, Shelf Stable, 284 mL
short_description: Campbell’s® shelf stable soups were created with one thing in mind – great taste. Campbell’s® Condensed Low Fat Cream of Mushroom Soup is made with real mushrooms, with only 2 g of fat per 250 mL. You can enjoy a bowl or use it to add extra flavour to your favourite recipes. It’s no wonder Campbell’s® Condensed soups have been a pantry staple in kitchens all across Canada for over 80 years.

product_name: Mutti Whole Peeled Tomatoes 796mL, Mutti Pelati
short_description: Mutti® Whole Peeled Tomatoes (Pelati) are plump, firm and versatile.  These sun-ripened 100% Italian tomatoes have a rich flavour, dense texture, and bright red colour. Use them in marinara sauce, on Neapolitan pizza, or in an anytime BLT.

product_name: Great Value Diced Tomatoes, Great Value Diced Tomatoes

These canned diced tomatoes are a must-have for making chili, soups, pasta sauces, and much more. Canned in tomato juice and lightly seasoned with salt, these diced tomatoes save time when preparing weeknight meals. The recipe for baked meatballs printed on the label is a convenient starting point for a satisfying family meal. product_name: Rodolfi Fine Diced Tomatoes, 398 mL
short_description: Tomatoes that are perfectly diced to be used as they are.  Good to be eaten uncooked, to make bruschetta, or to prepare sauces where the taste of the tomato has to be predominant. An excellent ingredient to use on quick or longer prepared dishes.

product_name: Aylmer Diced Tomatoes with Italian Spices, 769 ml
short_description: Use canned and jarred tomatoes in your favourite recipes all year long. Crushed tomatoes are great for pasta sauce, and diced or whole tomatoes work well in soups and stews.

product_name: Rodolfi Whole Tomatoes, 398 mL
short_description: Tomatoes have the skin removed, through the steaming, and then are immersed in a creamy passata. The velvety texture gives them the perfect characteristic to prepare several plates in the kitchen: they can be used as they are or into pieces. Perfect tomatoes: you don't need anything more.

product_name: Aurora Strained Crushed Tomatoes, 660 mL
short_description: A puree of Italian tomatos, with no additives. Just add your own spices, to taste, to make a great sauce.

product_name: Divella Italian Tomatoes (Whole, Peeled) with Basil, 28 oz tin
short_description: Divella Italian Tomatoes (28 oz can) are made in Italy using only Italian tomatoes. These are a great base to make an authentic Italian tomato sauce. Basil is added for even more authentic flavour.The Divella family has been making authentic food products in Italy since 1890. Still a family-owned business, Divella is proud of their more than 130 years of food expertise. Taste the difference for yourself.

product_name: Arrezzio Classi Tomato Peeled Whole Pear Heavy 2.84L/96 oz (6/Case)
short_description:
Arrezzio Classi Whole Pear Tomatoes in Heavy Juice: A Culinary Delight

Indulge in the exquisite taste of Arrezzio Classi Whole Pear Tomatoes in Heavy Juice. Crafted from premium pear tomatoes and packed in a rich, heavy juice with added calcium chloride for firmness, these tomatoes elevate your culinary creations to new heights. With their kosher, allergen-free, non-GMO, and Halal certifications, you can enjoy the pure flavor of these tomatoes with peace of mind.

Key Features:

  • Premium Quality: Made from the finest pear tomatoes, these whole tomatoes are carefully selected and packed to preserve their natural flavor and texture, ensuring a delightful culinary experience with every bite.
  • Rich Heavy Juice: Packed in a rich, heavy juice, these tomatoes are bursting with vibrant flavor and moisture, adding depth and richness to your dishes.
  • Added Calcium Chloride: With added calcium chloride, these tomatoes maintain their firmness, providing a satisfying texture that enhances the overall eating experience.
  • Certified Quality: Kosher certified, allergen-free, non-GMO, and Halal, these tomatoes meet the highest standards of quality and dietary requirements, making them suitable for a wide range of culinary preferences.
  • Convenient Packaging: Each case contains six 2.84L/96 oz containers of whole pear tomatoes, providing ample supply for restaurants, catering services, or home kitchens.

Elevate Your Culinary Creations

Arrezzio Classi Whole Pear Tomatoes in Heavy Juice are the perfect ingredient for adding depth and flavor to your favorite recipes. Whether you're making a classic marinara sauce, a hearty stew, or a vibrant pasta dish, these tomatoes provide a delicious foundation that elevates your dishes to gourmet levels.

Perfect for Every Meal

From weeknight dinners to special occasions, Arrezzio Classi Whole Pear Tomatoes in Heavy Juice are a versatile addition to any menu. Whether you're cooking for family, friends, or customers, these tomatoes add a touch of sophistication and flavor to every meal.

Order Now

Experience the premium quality and exquisite flavor of Arrezzio Classi Whole Pear Tomatoes in Heavy Juice. Stock your pantry with this essential ingredient today. Order your 6-case pack now and elevate your culinary creations with the richness of pear tomatoes in heavy juice

Packaging Information
• Six 102-Ounce cans per case
• Non-BPA intent cans
Size and Shape of Product
• Whole peeled Pear tomatoes packed in tomato juice
• Typical red colour
• 102-ounce can, 6.040" x 6.040" x 6.975"
Yield or Serving Size
• 132 - 1/2 cup (130g) servings per case
Servings per Case
• 132
Quality and Format
• Conventional. Not Organic. Not Fire-roasted
• Ready-to-serve convenience and consistency
• Selected from the very best California whole tomatoes and are packed fresh, in-season
Preparation Cooking Instructions
• Heat or cook as required by your recipe.
Handling Instructions
• Optimum dry storage conditions: 50-70°F, 60% relative humidity
Additional Product Information
• Case Dimensions - 18.

product_name: Great Value No Salt Added Dark Red Kidney Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Great Value Canned Dark Red Kidney Beans with no salt added are a perfect addition to any delicious chili, salads and soups. The satisfying, affordable beans are a great pantry staple, keep a can or two on hand in the kitchen to star in a family meal this week.

product_name: Great Value Six Bean Medley Canned Mixed Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Increase the nutritional value of your recipes with Great Value Six Bean Medley Canned Mixed Beans. This bean medley is low in fat, packed with nutrients and features a healthy blend of legumes, including chickpeas, red kidney beans, black-eyed peas, white beans, Romano beans and baby lima beans to provide a high source of dietary fibre. Convenient and ready-to-use, you can create a canned bean salad that can be enjoyed on its own with light dressing or add it to salads, stews, soups and sauces for hearty snacks and meals.

product_name: Great Value No Salt White Kidney Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Help your family fuel up at suppertime with the hearty and affordable goodness of Great Value White Kidney Beans, minus the extra salt. These beans are a great addition to your favourite soup, chili and burrito recipes.

product_name: Great Value Black Turtle Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Whether as a side dish or as part of a salad,  Great Value Black Turtle Beans are an easy and affordable way to add texture and flavour to your meal. Want to spice things up for supper? Try adding a can of Great Value Black Turtle Beans to your family's favourite chili recipe, for a hearty and home-cooked meal.

product_name: Great Value Dark Red Kidney Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Great Value Dark Red Kidney Beans are the perfect beans to perk up your next batch of chili and homemade soups! Each can of Great Value Dark Red Kidney Beans is a welcome affordable addition to keep stocked on your pantry shelves all year long.

product_name: Great Value Navy Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Great Value Canned Navy Beans are hearty and tasty. These classic white beans are easy to prepare as a side dish, or can become the star of the meal in soups, pies and other comforting dishes for your family on chilly days.

product_name: Heinz Original Beans in Tomato Sauce, Casein-Free, 398mL
short_description: For years, Heinz has proudly provided the highest quality products. Our Heinz Original Beans in Tomato Sauce are no exception! Try these rich, flavourful beans in a hearty sauce for the perfect complement to a variety of meals. Heinz Beans have been proudly prepared in Canada for over 100 years!

product_name: Great Value No Salt Chick Peas, 540 mL
short_description: Great Value chick peas, no salt added, are a healthy, great-tasting, addition to your family meal. Toss them whole for use in salads, serve them in a stir-fry with seasoned vegetables or crush them to make some hummus.

product_name: Green Giant Cut Wax Beans, 398 ml
short_description: Canadian grown, Green Giant Cut Wax Beans are deliciously tasty, cut in bite-sized pieces and canned quickly to preserve freshness and flavour.

product_name: Great Value Pinto Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Great Value Pinto Beans are flavourful beans that are easy to add to your daily meal plan, providing 8 g of fibre per 175 g serving to your favourite dishes. Use Great Value Pinto Beans in a burrito, paired with brown rice, or in the next pot of chili you make your family.

product_name: Unico High Fibre Bean Medley, 540 mL
short_description: Beans are versatile, nourishing and useful in soups and stews, cooked with meat or without.  Great in salads and vegetable dishes.

product_name: Unico No Salt Added Black Beans, Unico NSA Back Beans 540mL
short_description:
Beans are versatile, nourishing and useful in soups and stews, cooked with meat or without. Great in salads and vegetable dishes.

In addition to protein, beans provide complex carbohydrates, vitamin B, zinc and iron. They are also cholesterol-free, low in fat and high in fibre.

product_name: Grace Dry Pigeon Peas, 540ml Can, Grace Dry Pigeon Peas, 540ml Can
short_description: Grace Dry Pigeon Peas are a versatile and nutritious addition to your pantry, offering a delightful taste and texture that enhances a variety of dishes. These peas are a staple in Caribbean cuisine, known for their rich, earthy flavor and high nutritional value. Whether you're preparing traditional rice and peas, stews, soups, or salads, Grace Dry Pigeon Peas are the perfect ingredient to bring authentic flavor to your meals. Packaged in a convenient 540 ml can, they are easy to use and store, making meal preparation quick and simple. These pigeon peas are not only delicious but also packed with essential nutrients, including protein, fibre, vitamins, and minerals. They are an excellent choice for health-conscious individuals looking to add more plant-based protein to their diet. Grace Dry Pigeon Peas are a natural, wholesome option that supports a balanced and healthy lifestyle.

product_name: Unico Red Kidney Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Beans are versatile, nourishing and useful in soups and stews, cooked with meat or without. Great in salads and vegetable dishes.

product_name: Heinz Original Beans with Pork & Tomato Sauce, 398 mL Can, HEINZ BEANS WITH PORK 398ML 24
short_description: For years, Heinz has proudly provided the highest quality products. Our Heinz Original Beans with Pork & Tomato Sauce are no exception! These Original Beans with Pork and Tomato Sauce is a traditional bean recipe with a blend of savoury pork in a tangy tomato sauce. Heinz Beans have been proudly prepared in Canada for over 100 years!

product_name: Heinz Deep-Browned Beans with Pork & Molasses, 398 mL Can, HEINZ MOLASSES & PORK BEANS 398ML 24
short_description: For years, Heinz has proudly provided the highest quality products. Our Heinz Deep-Browned Beans with Pork & Molasses are no exception! Try these rich, flavourful beans in a hearty sauce for the perfect complement to a variety of meals. Heinz Beans have been proudly prepared in Canada for over 100 years!

product_name: Old El Paso Mexican Refried Beans, Pinto Beans, 398 ml, 398 mL
short_description: Savour the authentic, rich taste of Old El Paso Refried Beans, crafted with hearty pinto beans cooked to perfection for an unforgettable flavour experience. These scrumptious refried beans serve as a mouth-watering side dish or a tasty addition to burritos, tacos, and other Mexican favourites. Embrace the vegetarian goodness with this wholesome, plant-based option that is both delectable and vegetarian-friendly. Elevate your snacking game by following the step-by-step instructions on the can to create a delicious, multi-layered bean dip that will impress your guests and tantalize your taste buds. Enjoy the delightful fusion of flavour and texture that Old El Paso Refried Beans brings to your table. Contains 398 ml of refried beans in total.

product_name: Unico White Kidney Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Beans are versatile, nourishing and useful in soups and stews, cooked with meat or without. Great in salads and vegetable dishes.

product_name: Sprague Sugarbush Baked Beans with Maple Syrup, Sugarbush Baked Beans
short_description: Baked Beans with Fosterholm Maple Syrup

product_name: Green Giant Sweetlet* Peas, 398 ml
short_description: Tender, young, petite peas Picked at the Peak of PerfectionTM then canned to preserve nutrients and flavour. Prepare to use as a side dish, add to a salad, pasta, sheppard’s pie, or in your favourite recipe.

product_name: Pride Of India - PACK of 6 - Indian Whole White Garbanzo Beans 10mm - Protein & Fiber Rich Kabuli Chana, 3 Pound Jar
short_description: Pride Of India's nutritious range of lentils are naturally cultivated in the humid and temperate areas of India for small periods every year using the best farming practices. The split lentils are easy to digest and are a great source of protein, fiber, and iron. Our lentils can be consumed independently as well as in combination with rice and bread.

product_name: Uni-Pak Green Peas, 155g
short_description: Uni-Pak Green Peas 155g. Product of the Philippines

product_name: La Costeña Refried Black Beans 28.9 oz (12-Case) - Nutritious and Flavorful Refried Black Beans
short_description:
Elevate your meals with the delightful taste of La Costeña Refried Black Beans. These refried black beans are a versatile and nutritious addition to your kitchen. La Costeña, a trusted Mexican company dedicated to quality canned products, brings you these flavorful and convenient beans.

Each case contains twelve 28.9 oz cans of La Costeña Refried Black Beans, ensuring you have plenty to create delicious and satisfying dishes. These beans are made from prepared black beans, water, onion, salt, jalapeno, pepper, soybean oil, and garlic, offering a rich and savory flavor profile.

From burritos to enchiladas, these refried black beans are a fantastic companion to a wide range of Mexican and Latin American recipes. Elevate your culinary creations with the authentic taste of La Costeña.

Key Features:

  1. Nutritious and Flavorful: La Costeña Refried Black Beans provide both nutrition and delicious taste in every bite.

Preparation and Cooking Instructions
• 1. In a large saucepan, whisk 510 g (full bag) Alfredo sauce mix into 3 L cold water.

product_name: McCain® Superfries® Straight Cut Fries, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 650g
short_description: When you're craving fries, nothing satisfies like McCain® Superfries® Straight Cut French fries. Crispy, delicious, and easy to prepare, these mouth-watering McCain fries make a fast and easy side dish or snack. Made with specially selected potatoes, these frozen French fries are trans-fat and cholesterol-free for a snacking option you can feel good about. Just pop these straight cut fries into the oven or cook them in your air fryer for the same crispy, delicious results in even less time. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 360°F (182°C), fill basket halfway, air fry for 12-13 minutes, sliding out basket and shaking fries halfway through. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C) and cook for 18-22 minutes, turning halfway through. See full details on packaging.

product_name: McCain® Bistro Selects™ Super Crisps® Straight Cut French Fries, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 650g

Simply place these frozen straight-cut fries in the preheated basket of your air fryer to enjoy crispy fries in 13 minutes or less. Or, spread them into a single layer on a baking sheet and prepare for delicious oven-baked fries in 22-26 minutes. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 360°F (182°C), fill basket halfway, air fry for 12-13 minutes, sliding out basket and shaking fries halfway through. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C), spread frozen fries in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 22-26 minutes, turning halfway through. Can also be made in a toaster oven. product_name: McCain® Super Spirals® - Curly Fries, 650g
short_description: Meals are more fun with McCain® Super Spirals®. These frozen curly fries add a touch of fun to your plate while still enjoying the taste of lightly spiced real potatoes. These playful spiral fries cook up golden and crispy in as few as 10 minutes in your air fryer, or you can pop them in the oven and bake them in under 20 minutes. Satay traditionally consists of cubes of meat, predominantly chicken, that is grilled on a skewer. Indonesian satay skewers are often served with a peanut sauce, which has become synonymous with the word ‘Satay’
The sweet, but savoury and nutty flavours of our Indonesian Peanut Satay is the perfect accompaniment to any grilled skewers, but you can also make wonderful and versatile stir-fries with meat, seafood, tofu, or vegetables - or throw it all together with some noodles to make a delicious one-pot dish!

Cut from the bottom sirloin, this AAA Angus tri tip steak rivals ribeye for flavour and tenderness. With its excellent fat marbling, it’s a natural for the BBQ grill and quick pan-searing.

product_name: Boneless Top Blade Steak Value Pack Cut From Canada AA, 6–12 steaks, 0.70 - 1.20 KG
short_description:
Steak night... but make it budget friendly. No problem: we’ve got your menu covered with AA Tender Chuck Steaks (Value Pack)!

An affordable alternative to filet mignon or tenderloin, chuck tender steaks are lean but tender, with a wonderfully delicate flavour. Give them that melt-in-your-mouth texture by marinating them in a vinegar-based marinade (or fresh lemon juice!) and giving them a quick pound with the mallet before grilling them on the BBQ.

Or, for a more fall-apart-on-the-fork texture, braise ’em low and slow in a Dutch oven to bring out all their flavour and tenderness.

Cut from AA Canadian beef, our tender chuck steak value pack is vacuum sealed for freshness.

product_name: AA Eye of Round (0.25-0.58kg), 5–7 pieces (0.25-0.58kg), 0.25 - 0.58 KG
short_description:
Get a mouthwatering weeknight dinner on the table in a flash with our Beef Eye Of Round Fast Fry Steaks. Cut from AA Canadian eye of round, each package contains 5 to 7 thin steaks that cook up fast in the pan or on the grill.

Bring out their tenderness with a quick marinade in pineapple juice or your favourite sauce, then cook them quickly to lock in their flavour and juices. (Alternatively, you can cook them low and slow with plenty of sauce in a crockpot for a tender, low-maintenance meat dish.)

Serve them like steak or toss ’em on a bun with cooked onions, cheese and sauce. Easy-peasy and oh-so good!

product_name: AA Striploin Steak (0.13-0.4kg), 1 steak, 0.13 - 0.40 KG
short_description:
Summer’s here and we’re here with the sizzle: Beef Striploin Steak! Cut from AA Canadian boneless striploin, this is the bold, beefy steak meat lovers dream of.

Also known as NY strip, this premium, moderately marbled cut (1 steak per tray) is known for its tenderness, juiciness and rich, beefy flavour.

The ultimate BBQ steak, striploin grills like a dream. Its rich marbling melts into the meat, giving it the tender texture and robust flavour it is known for.

There isn’t much you need to do to prepare a winning striploin steak. Season it, slap it on the grill (or cast iron fry pan) to your preferred doneness, then plate it with potatoes and a green salad. Done and done!

product_name: AA Boneless Rib Steak (0.15-0.425kg), 1 steak, 0.15 - 0.43 KG
short_description:
Skip the steakhouse and treat yourself to an epic steak dinner at home! You can’t go wrong with AA Beef Boneless Rib Steak. Also known as ribeye, this tender cut is packed with bold, beefy flavour, making it the king of steaks.

Whether you’re a stickler for rare, medium-rare, medium or even well-done steak, the rich marbling of this boneless rib steak will ensure you bite into the most tender and flavourful beef around!

A must for the BBQ, ribeye can also be prepared on a cast iron fry pan. You don’t have to do much to bring out its incredible flavour: just season it with salt and pepper or your favourite steak spice blend: that’s all it needs. Bon appétit!

Fresh & Familiar delivers value, crunch and flavour.

product_name: Lettuce, Green Leaf, Sold in singles
short_description: Green leaf lettuce, a tender and refreshing variety, is a delightful addition to your salads and sandwiches. With its vibrant green leaves and delicate texture, it offers a mild and slightly sweet flavour. Whether used as a base for colourful salads or as a crisp wrap for your favourite fillings, green leaf lettuce brings a great touch to your culinary creations. Packed with vitamins, minerals, and dietary fibre, it not only pleases the taste buds but also contributes to a nourishing diet. Embrace the crisp allure of green leaf lettuce, enhancing your meals with its refreshing and versatile essence.

product_name: Lettuce, Romaine, Sold in singles
short_description: Romaine lettuce, the crisp and refreshing jewels of the salad world, offer a delightful and wholesome dining experience. With their tender and compact leaves, they are the epitome of freshness. These versatile lettuce hearts are perfect for creating hearty and nutritious salads or as a healthy base for wraps and sandwiches. The crunchy texture and mild, slightly peppery flavour add a satisfying element to any dish. Packed with essential nutrients like vitamins A and K, as well as fibre, romaine lettuce hearts contribute to a well-balanced and nourishing diet. Embrace the crisp and vibrant essence of romaine lettuce hearts, elevating your meals with their delicious and wholesome appeal.

product_name: Inspired Greens Living Lettuce Tender & Tasty Trio, Living Lettuce Trio
short_description:
Unlike other lettuce, Inspired Greens are harvested with the root-pot still attached. This means they are living plants and can stay fresh for weeks in your crisper!

With 3 types of lettuce, our trio creates meals with a contrast of taste, texture, colours and shapes all from one head. You can feed your whole family, or cut only a portion from the root for a single serve salad.

product_name: Sadaf Tomato Paste, No added Salt, A thick, concentrated paste made from cooked tomatoes
short_description: Sadaf Tomato Paste is a kitchen essential, offering a rich, highly concentrated paste of sun-ripened tomatoes. Meticulously cooked down, this deep red paste provides an intense, savory umami flavor and a natural thickness crucial for many dishes.  It is the secret ingredient for adding depth, color, and body to your cooking. Use just a small amount to enhance the richness of pasta sauces, chilis, soups, and stews. Choose Sadaf for a quality, pure, and robust tomato flavor that elevates every savory creation.

product_name: Mini Cucumbers, 1 lb
short_description:
Sunset Grown Mini Cucumbers
Get ready to crunch your way to fun with Sunset Grown Mini Cucumbers! These adorable baby cukes are perfect for snacking all day long. Their bite-sized goodness makes them the ultimate dippers for veggie platters and appetizer plates. Slice them up and toss them into a wrap for a fresh twist. One thing’s for sure: these minis are a majorly fun way to add more veggies to your menu.

product_name: Cucumber, English, Sold in Single Wrap
short_description:
Long English Cucumbers are cool, crisp, and refreshing. These deliciously crunchy cucumbers are packed with water and refined sweetness, making them a guilt-free treat any time of day. Enjoy them sliced, dipped, or straight from the fridge: freshness you can taste in every bite.

• Long English Cucumbers are the perfect healthy snack!
• Ideal for lunch, dinner, or an easy snack.
• Super refreshing and delicious.
• Grown in a warm greenhouse to ensure consistent quality and freshness.
• Wash and enjoy!

product_name: Sow Right Seeds - Beit Alpha Cucumber Seeds for Planting - Non-GMO Heirloom Packet with Instructions to Plant and Grow a Home Vegetable Garden - Start Indoors, Plant Outdoors with Trellis (4)
short_description: Beit Alpha cucumber seeds for your home vegetable garden Minimum of 1g per packet

product_name: Burpless #26 Hybrid Cucumber Seeds
short_description: Burpless #26 Hybrid Cucumber Seeds: 50 days. Dark green, straight cucumbers to 12 inches long. A very early cucumber with a thin skin and a mild flavor with no bitterness. Superior in eating quality. Good for fresh markets and trellised gardens. Resistant to Downey mildew, Powdery mildew, and Cucumber Mosaic virus. Package contains approximately 15 Burpless #26 Hybrid Cucumber Seeds. Burpless #26 Hybrid Cucumber Seeds - Planting Instructions: Germination: 6 to 10 days at 75 to 85 F. Plant seeds 1 inch deep, 24 inches apart with 48 inches between rows.

product_name: Lemon Cucumber Seeds
short_description: Size:Package = 3 grams 65 days to harvest. Sunny yellow baseball sized fruits with white to bright yellow flesh resemble a lemon growing from the vine. The Lemon cucumber is a unique variety of cucumber that is sweet and tender. The Lemon cucumber is round and yellow. Since this variety is mature in just sixty five days, a steady harvest can be achieved by planting regularly throughout the season. Package contains 3 grams, approximately 150 Lemon Cucumber Seeds. Planting Instructions: Germination: 6 to 10 days at 75 to 85F. Plant 1' deep, 24' apart with about 48' between rows.

product_name: David's Garden Seeds Cucumber Pickling Eureka 1925 (Green) 25 Non-GMO, Hybrid Seeds
short_description: Very dark green, firm fruits have a medium to small seed cavity. Hand harvest. David’s Garden Seeds is a Veteran owned business that has been offering quality since 2009.

product_name: Sunset Grown Organic Mini Cucumbers, 1 lb
short_description:
Try fresh organic cucumbers in a snackable miniature size! Sunset Grown Organic Mini Cucumbers are the perfect little dippers for appetizer plates and vegetable platters. Or slice them up to add to salads and wraps. These certified organic mini cukes are big on fresh veggie flavour with a hydrating crunch your whole family will love.

FRESHNESS GUARANTEED

to pick the best and freshest products to meet your expectations. Satisfaction guaranteed* or your money back!

product_name: Cucumber, Organic, Sold in singles
short_description:
Organic cucumbers are a refreshing and nutritious addition to any meal. Known for their crisp texture and mild flavor, they’re perfect for salads, sandwiches, or as a crunchy snack. Grown without synthetic pesticides or fertilizers, organic cucumbers are free from harmful chemicals, offering a pure and natural taste. They’re also hydrating, making them a great choice for hot days.

product_name: SUNSET Rainbow Bell Peppers, SUNSET Rainbow Bell Peppers, 3ct
short_description: Bell peppers are versatile vegetables that add a delightful crunch and burst of flavour to various dishes. With their glossy, bell-shaped exteriors and crisp, juicy flesh, they are a treat for the senses. Whether raw in salads, sautéed in stir-fries, stuffed, or roasted, bell peppers bring a unique and pleasant taste to the table. Packed with vitamins, antioxidants, and dietary fibre, bell peppers not only enhance the culinary experience but also contribute to a nutritious diet. Embrace the versatility of bell peppers in your cooking and enjoy the delightful texture and flavour they bring to your meals.

short_description: Whether sautéed, raw or chopped up in a salad, these bell peppers bring flavour, crunch and colour to any meal. Cut them into slices and serve with hummus for a great appetizer, or cook them in a stir fry as a tasty entrée.

short_description: SUNSET Wild Wonders Mini Peppers: A medley of colors that will take your taste buds on an endless journey of flavor. These sweet treats are sublime.
