Enjoy SUNSET Wild Wonders Mini Peppers all year round.

product_name: SUNSET Wannabeez™ Peppers 2.5lb, Wannabeez™ Peppers 2.5lb
short_description: Wannabeez peppers are perfectly imperfect! A bright and colorful addition to any recipe, perfect for sautéing, roasting, grilling, slicing, and more. These peppers feature the natural qualities of vegetables, without compromising on flavor! Low in calories and rich in vitamins and minerals, they make a delicious and healthy snack. Certified non-GMO and grown in a greenhouse to ensure consistent flavor and availability. Keep refrigerated for optimal freshness and wash before enjoying.

short_description:
Well, we decided to bring the traditional kettle cooked back. Dutch Crunch chips are kettle-cooked in the highest quality vegetable oil, a small batch at a time. We insist on vegetable oil because it has no cholesterol, which is good, and it cooks the chips to a perfect crisp, with no oily taste, which is great.

A half cup of cooked plantains packs almost 3 grams of resistant starch, a healthy carb that boosts metabolism and burns fat. They contain more of some vitamins and minerals. They are a rich source of fiber, vitamins A, C, and B-6, and the minerals magnesium and potassium..

product_name: Pride Of India - Spicy Chickpea Masala Papadum Lentil Crisp, 10 count (3.53oz - 100gm) - Microwaveable Instant Chips, Gluten-Free Vegan Crackers, Healthy Protein, Fiber & Iron Rich Snacks
short_description: Pride of India incorporates gourmet-grown food and herbal products from India into our daily life. These all-natural ingredients help enhance the overall health of the human body. Pride of India is family owned and operated, and we manufacture our products in the USA. Indian papadums (poppadoms or papad) are a traditional Indian snack food. They are similar to tortillas and flatbreads. Our papadums are made of chickpeas, lentils and Indian spices. Lentils contain healthy protein, iron, and fiber. Plus, they help reduce cholesterol. Because these lentil crisps are gluten free and don’t have trans fats, they are a healthier snack than traditional potato chips. These papadums are also handmade by women in India, and each purchase of these lentil crisps contributes to small businesses and women empowerment in India. Popadums are usually made as a dough that needs to rest before baking. These lentil crisps, however, are ready in seconds! Just put them over a heat source (oven, microwave, stove, etc.) for 60 to 90 seconds until crispy. Lentil crisps are a great meal starter or snack. With an intoxicating blend of Indian spices, you can eat them alone or dip them in sauces, curries, or hummus. This package contains 10 chili chickpea spicy papadum. Try other flavors of lentil crisps, and shop other health and beauty products by Pride of India.

Ingredients: Enriched Corn Flour (Corn Flour, Ferrous Sulfate, Niacin, Thiamin Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Vegetable Oil (Contains One or More of the Following: Corn, Soybean, Sunflower, or Partially Hydrogenated Soybean Oil), Salt, Arbol Chile Peppers, Guajillo Chile Peppers, Chipotle Chile Peppers, and less than 2% of the Following: Citric Acid, Palm Olein Oil, Concentrated Soy Protein, Lime Powder, Ascorbic Acid, Maltodextrin, Artificial Flavor, Artificial Color, and Sodium Benzoate and BHT (Preservatives).

product_name: Orville Redenbacher Original Kernel Popcorn, 850 g, Non-GMO, whole grain kernel popcorn with a  high source of fibre and gluten free
short_description: Relive childhood joys with an all-natural taste of nostalgia. Orville Redenbacher seeks out the very best ingredients and grows an exclusive kernel on family farms to create a quality snack for your quality time. It’s hard to beat the familiar taste of Orville Redenbacher Popcorn - Kernels Original. From on the go to taking it slow, this organic popcorn is a firm family favourite. It’s been voted most trusted popcorn brand by Canadian shoppers and, with its unmistakable taste and lack of artificial colours, flavours and preservatives, it’s easy to see why. These light, fluffy clusters of happiness are  gluten free and Non-GMO. They’re an  100% whole grain snack for you and your little ones to enjoy whenever you want, wherever you are. Popcorn time is family time. That’s why self-taught farmer Orville Redenbacher worked tirelessly for 35 years to create the perfect popcorn on the stove for movie nights, sleepovers, after-school snacks, and picnics. It took 30,000 different kernel hybrids to achieve healthy snacking perfection, with all ingredients from natural sources and a flavour that has delighted generations. Young and old alike agree: Orville Redenbacher popcorn kernels are little nuggets of joy. Take the excitement up a notch with classic stovetop kernels. Young eyes are sure to widen as the pan starts to judder and the pops ring out. When the popping slows, all that's left to do is take off the lid and wait for the squeals of delight! Special shared moments call for unforgettable popcorn.

short_description: There’s popcorn, then there’s Poppycock. Give in to the melt-in-your-mouth caramel flavour of the signature glaze on this traditional popcorn and savour the satisfying crunch of almonds and pecans. There’s a reason it’s been pleasing sophisticated palates for more than half a century. Discerning popcorn lovers simply aren’t satisfied with the norm. Poppycock takes things to the next level by combining the rich flavour of real butter popcorn with the unparalleled texture of nuts and decadent glaze. It’s almost impossible to resist. The carefully selected ingredients for this enduring foodies’ favourite have no artificial colours or flavours and are gluten-free. And it’s these quality components that combine to create Poppycock’s unforgettable, unrivalled taste. Available in convenient 300 gram containers, these delicious clusters of indulgence are on hand at all times. Whether you’re choosing a memorable gift for a treasured friend, celebrating a special family occasion, or enjoying a cozy evening in, Poppycock is the perfect treat to share. Or you could keep it all to yourself. Tempting, isn’t it? Poppycock popcorn has been a family favourite over the holidays since 1950, and, with mouth-watering flavour, that comes as no surprise. This is grown-up popcorn. This is a moment to savour.

short_description: The Centerstage Professional HTD Canada Popcorn Company authentic theater 8 oz portion packs are for use in all popcorn machines 8 oz or larger. You will get a box of 24, 8 oz portion packs. Our blend is the same as found in national theater chains, so if you want real theater popcorn at home, you found it. These handy popcorn portion packs have the following features: No measuring, No mess, No clean-up. Pre-measured amounts of popcorn, seasoning salt, butter and coconut oil for perfect popcorn every time. For use in all residential or commercial kettle style popcorn poppers. Peanut free, Gluten Free, 0 Trans Fats, Pareve Certified Kosher and Diacetyl Free. DIRECTIONS: Cut and place our theater oil in your kettle and once is has melted then add our kernels and popcorn seasoning, close lid and wait for the popping to begin. Once the popcorn popping has slowed in your machine kettle to more than 10 seconds between pops please stop and dump your kettle. SIZE: 24 - 8 oz popcorn packs

product_name: Pack of 24 - Jiffy Pop Butter Flavour Popcorn
short_description: Jiffy pop is more than just popcorn. When you venture out into nature but still want that comforting taste of home, Jiffy pop is there. Made from the finest corn kernels since 1959, Jiffy pop has been delighting tastebuds and creating memories for generations. Whether you’re gathering around the tree over the holidays or looking for a savoury camping snack on a long summer evening before the s’mores-making starts, reach for this easy butter flavoured popcorn and feel the excitement build as the popping begins. Set the stage and watch little eyes widen in wonder as the popping builds and gradually slows until they know their stovetop popcorn is ready to eat! Be sure to supervise young children, follow the printed instructions exactly, and have an adult open the heated container with a fork to release the steam. Be careful, it’s HOT. Made in a peanut-free facility and free from gluten, this fibre-rich snack with 260 calories per serving and no artificial colours or flavours makes the perfect crowd-pleasing popcorn for long summer adventures. After a fun-filled day in the fresh air, get together around the campfire, or curl up in sleeping bags with your freshly popped corn. Add in stories, songs, or even a movie to create an unforgettable experience for years to come.

short_description: Yupik Popping Corn is made of unpopped, plump, golden kernels! short_description: A small, flat, and round wafer type, traditional Italian cookie laced with a hint of vanilla.Pizzelle are an ancient, traditional Italian cookie, enjoyed originally by ancestors from the Abruzzi region of Italy. Today, you can enjoy this centery old recipe without all the hard work.

short_description:
Crispy, Creamy, and Bursting with Real Strawberry Flavor – A Classic Canadian Treat

Stock Up and Savor the Sweetness

product_name: Maple Terroir Matcha Green Tea Maple Stroopwafel Cookies 1190g caddy x 2 (34g x 70 pcs)
short_description: Matcha Green Tea Maple Stroopwafel Cookies - Maple Terroir's Dutch-style stroopwafels has a filling made with pure matcha powder from Kyoto, Japan and pure maple syrup. They are so delicious it's hard to eat only one! These stroopwafels are made with premium non-GMO ingredients and contains 0g trans fat. Balls of dough are put into a heated waffle iron and pressed into a uniformly thin, round shape. After the waffle has been baked, and while it is still warm, it is split into thin layered halves. The warm matcha and maple syrup filling is then spread between the waffle halves, gluing them together. Each stroopwafel is individually wrapped for convenience and sharing. Athletes of all levels can also enjoy these delicious, chewy, energy-boosting stroopwafels. Place a stroopwafel cookie on top of a cup of hot tea or coffee for a melty treat or break one up as a topping for ice cream. Each 1190g caddy contains 35 individually wrapped stroopwafels, 34g per stroopwafel.

product_name: Siete - Mexican Shortbread Cookies, 4.5oz
short_description: Pour yourself a glass of cold dairy-free milk! Siete Grain-Free Mexican Cookies are delicious gluten-free cookies, inspired by the traditional flavors of Mexico.Key InformationMexican Cookies Made With Almond Flour and Coconut SugarVegan and Cruelty-FreeFree From Gluten and GrainsNon-GMO Project VerifiedFamily-Owned BusinessProduct OverviewSiete Grain Free Mexican Cookies deliver the delicious flavors and textures of traditional Mexican sweets, with none of the guilt or refined sugar. Made with only the highest quality, plant-based ingredients, including nutrient-dense almond flour, crunchy pecans, and sweetened with coconut sugar, these mouthwatering, moreish cookies are free from dairy, gluten, grains, and absolutely anything artificial. Siete’s Grain-Free Mexican Cookies are made with love by their family, for you and yours. Siete Family Foods is a mission-based company, passionate about making and sharing delicious, nutritious Mexican sweet treats, gathering and participating in communities, and advocating for happy, healthy lifestyles among Latino families.Mexican Chocolate CookiesSiete’s delicious chocolate cookies deliver the spiced, comforting taste of traditional Mexican hot chocolate in a convenient cookie form. Flavored with rich, dark cocoa and warming cinnamon, these little bites of chocolate heaven are the perfect treat for all the family.Mexican Shortbread CookiesSiete’s take on traditional Mexican Shortbread Cookies, also known as hojarascas, or pan de Polvo, recreates that nostalgic treat found in any well-stocked Mexican bakery or pantry. They are crunchy, sweet, and moreish, elevated with a dash of cinnamon, and delicious alongside a steaming cup of coffee. Siete makes their traditional shortbread cookies with nutritious, nutty almond flour and crisp pecan pieces.Mexican Wedding CookiesSiete has developed a fantastic dairy-free, gluten-free alternative to the celebratory and much-loved Mexican wedding cookie. Essential for every wedding, quinceañera, anniversary, & special occasion, these cookies are made from a lightly sweetened blend of almond flour, pecans, powdered sugar, and cinnamon.IngredientsMexican Chocolate CookiesGrain-Free Flour Blend (Almond Flour, Tapioca Flour, Arrowroot Flour, Chickpea Flour, Cassava Flour), Coconut Oil, Coconut Sugar, Avocado Oil, Alkalized Cocoa Powder, Apple Cider Vinegar, Cinnamon, Sea Salt, Baking Soda, Jasmine Tea Extract.Mexican Shortbread CookiesGrain-Free Flour Blend (Almond Flour, Tapioca Flour, Arrowroot Flour, Cassava Flour, Chickpea Flour), Coconut Oil, Coconut Sugar, Avocado Oil, Apple Cider Vinegar, Sea Salt, Cinnamon, Baking Soda, Orange Peel Powder, Vanilla Extract, Jasmine Tea Extract.Mexican Wedding CookiesGrain-Free Flour Blend (Almond Flour, Tapioca Flour, Arrowroot Flour, Cassava Flour, Chickpea Flour), Coconut Oil, Coconut Sugar, Powdered Sugar, (Sugar, Tapioca Flour), Pecan Pieces, Avocado Oil, Apple Cider Vinegar, Sea Salt, Baking Soda, Cinnamon, Orange Peel Powder, Vanilla Extract, Jasmine Tea Extract.Frequently Asked QuestionsWhy are Siete Grain Free Mexican Cookies made with coconut sugar?Coconut sugar is derived from the dehydrated sap of the coconut palm tree, not from the coconut fruit. Siete Grain Free Mexican Cookies are sweetened with coconut sugar rather than refined cane sugar because it is a minimally processed, natural sweetener thought to be healthier than conventional sugar. It is known to retain some of the nutrients found in the coconut palm and contains a soluble fiber called inulin which is linked to minimizing post-cookie blood sugar spikes.

short_description:
Crispy, Chocolatey, and Proudly Canadian – A Classic Cookie for Every Occasion

Bite into the perfectly golden-baked crunch of Voortman Chocolate Chip Cookies, made with real, semi-sweet chocolate chips for a rich, satisfying flavor in every bite. Crafted with wholesome ingredients, these cookies contain no artificial flavors and no high-fructose corn syrup, making them a better-for-you indulgence without compromising on taste. Proudly made in Canada, Voortman delivers a high-quality cookie that’s perfect for snacking, sharing, and enjoying with your favorite beverage.

Why Choose Voortman Chocolate Chip Cookies?

Canadian-Made Quality

  • Proudly crafted in Canada with premium ingredients for superior taste
  • No artificial flavors, no high-fructose corn syrup – a snack you can feel good about

Crispy, Chocolatey Perfection

  • Golden-baked crunch with just the right amount of crispiness
  • Loaded with real chocolate chips for a rich, decadent bite

Perfect for Any Occasion

  • Bulk 12-case pack – great for stocking up at home or work
  • Pairs perfectly with coffee, tea, or milk for a comforting treat
  • Great for parties, lunchboxes, or sharing with family and friends

Specs That Deliver

  • Package Size: 228g/8oz – just the right portion for snacking
  • Case Quantity: 12 packs – ideal for bulk buyers and cookie lovers
  • Storage: Keep in a cool, dry place for lasting freshness

Endless Ways to Enjoy

  • Snack straight from the pack for a quick and satisfying treat
  • Dunk in milk or coffee for the ultimate indulgence
  • Crumble over ice cream or mix into dessert recipes
  • Share with loved ones at gatherings, in the office, or as a thoughtful gift

Stock Up and Savor Every Bite

Voortman Chocolate Chip Cookies bring you real ingredients, authentic flavor, and pure chocolatey goodness in every crispy bite. Whether you're enjoying them solo or sharing with family, these cookies are a Canadian-made classic that belong in every pantry.

Made with sustainably sourced cocoa, these colourful delights are made with natural colours and flavours. Plus, they're produced in a peanut-free facility. And now, all SMARTIES packaging is made with paper, as part of the SMARTIES initiative to create a more colourful world for our children. This will help remove up to 26 tonnes of plastic packaging in Canada!; It's easy to share the joy of SMARTIES with family and friends, or bake them into creative, homemade treats - the possibilities are endless! The only question is, DO YOU EAT THE RED ONES LAST?

product_name: M&M'S, Milk Chocolate Candies, Family Size Bag, 345 g, GOI F&B - Item Short Description
short_description: Enjoy the classic that’s loved around the world! M&M'S have been one of the most famous candy treats in the world since 1941. The bite-sized pieces of chocolate in a colourful candy shell are instantly recognizable all over the globe. Made with real milk chocolate and crunchy candy shells, M&M’S Milk Chocolate Candies are a classic treat and crowd favourite. Perfect for parties and celebrations of all kinds, these tasty candies are sure to delight friends and family. Take these bite-size chocolates with you on the go or pass a pack around during study breaks. Stock up and keep M&M'S Milk Chocolate Candy on hand for birthday parties, neighborhood get-togethers or movie nights. Don’t forget to save some for yourself; these chocolate treats are a delightful way to wind down at the end of the day. Decorate party favours with M&M’S Milk Chocolate Candy or add these colourful chocolates to candy buffets and dessert tables. Add a dash of fun and brighten up your favourite dessert or power snack recipe by mixing in M&M’S Chocolates. Best of all, these tasty candies are easy to share with friends. Bring summer candy on road trips, camping or glamping for a trustworthy chocolate treat. Stack your pantry at home to have options for summer dessert recipes or ice cream toppings. Share delicious, colourful fun with M&M'S Milk Chocolate Candy!
